153a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / / ri bong zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnam
153a2(mdo sde): dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams
153a3(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
153a4(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
153a5(mdo sde): dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
153a6(mdo sde): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang
153a7(mdo sde): ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur
153b1(mdo sde): spyod pa las/ phyi zhig na chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / khye'u zhig btsas nas de bskyed bsrings te cher gyur to// de'i pha ni nor yang zad par gyur/ longs spyod
153b2(mdo sde): kyang zad par gyur to/ / de'ang mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / rtsa lag gi 'dab che ba zhig ste/ bu de dus dus su nye du rnams kyi thad du gtong ngo // de nas de nye du de dag gis ci nas de dag dang phyir zhing
153b3(mdo sde): mdza' bar 'gyur ba de lta bur gzhon to/ / phyis re zhig na de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
153b4(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa// 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
153b5(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las
153b6(mdo sde): skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos pas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du blta bar gyur te/ pha ma gnyis kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab
153b7(mdo sde): tu byung ngo / de de ltar rab tu byung nas nye du de dag dang lhan cig tu 'du zhing gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyim pa dang / 'du ba las bzlog nas dgon par gnas pa la 'dzud par mdzad na de der
154a1(mdo sde): mi dka' 'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum kyi bar du khyim pa dang / 'du ba las bzlog par mdzad de/ bu khyim pa dang / 'du ba 'di ni nyes bdu ma dang ldan
154a2(mdo sde): mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang / 'phangs pa dang / snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / chags par 'gyur ba dang / tsher ma dang 'dra ba dang
154a3(mdo sde): rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / sdug pa dang / 'phangs pa
154a4(mdo sde): dang / snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / chags par 'gyur ba dang / tsher ma dang 'dra ba dag yod do zhes gsungs so// gang du gnas bcas na dge ba'i chos rnams
154a5(mdo sde): 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dgon pa'i yon tan dag kyang rnam grangs du mar bsngags so/ / de nas re zhig na rigs kyi bu des dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/ dgon par gnas pa la'ang
154a6(mdo sde): rtag tu brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par
154a7(mdo sde): 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags
154b1(mdo sde): dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa
154b2(mdo sde): rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi blta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams

155a1(mdo sde): ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu 'di lan gsum gyi bar du grong nas bzlog ste/ dgon pa'i gnas la btsud pa nas/ dgra bcom
155a2(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba

155a5(mdo sde): sul chu 'bab cing me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rdo gu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig na drang srong dka' thub drag po spyod pa/ zas su 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chus 'tsho ba/ ri dgas kyi
155a6(mdo sde): g.yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon pa/ me'i sbyin sreg byed pa zhig 'dug go// drang srong de'i mdza' bo'ang ri bong mi'i skad shes pa zhig yod de/ de nyin gcig bzhin du drang srong gi thang du dus gsum du 'gro'o
155a7(mdo sde): der song nas gus par smra ba byas te/ gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ de gnyis phyir zhing mdza' bar gyur te/ pha spad dang 'dra bar 'dug go// phyis re zhig na than
155b1(mdo sde): chen byung nas des chu klung dang khron pa rnams chu chung bar gyur la/ shing rnams cang me tog dang 'bras bu med par gyur to// de nas drang srong de gnas de na bza' ba med pas mi dga' nas des ri dgas kyi

155b6(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa 'di dag ni sdud cing sogs pa la sred pas na/ 'dis ni bdag deng kha zas sna 'ga' zhig la g.yar 'dren par 'dod gor ma chag snyam ste/ des de la khas blangs so//

156a1(mdo sde): skyes pas bya mi bya mi shes nas khyod la cung zad nongs pa ci bgyis pa bdag la khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces smras nas/ tshum com med par me'i nang du mchongs so//

158a2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/
158a3(mdo sde): na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
158a4(mdo sde): tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni lugs kyis nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das blta
158a5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir song nas/ rang gis lag dar te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'phyag par byed do// de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la brel ba zhig byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems
158a6(mdo sde): can bsod nams 'dod pa rnams la bsod nams kyi gnas bstan pa'i phyir nyid kyis phyag dar te/ phyags ma bsnams nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'phyag par mdzad do// nyan thos chen po
158a7(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srungs dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gru la sogs pas kyang bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ phyag bdar byed pa la zhugs so// de nas
158b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phyags nas 'dun khang du gshegs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so//
158b2(mdo sde): bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lnga po 'di dag ni phyag bdar byed pa'i phan yon yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid sems dga'
158b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan sems dga' bar 'gyur pa dang / lha rnams mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang / lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho
158b4(mdo sde): ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba'o/ / de nas mgon med zas sbyin yang phyogs der phyin nas/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dag dang thabs cig tu phyag dar te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed
158b5(mdo sde): kyi tshal phyags so zhes de skad thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dag dang thabs cig tu phyag dar te/ phyag bdar mdzad pa de'i steng du bdag ji ltar
158b6(mdo sde): 'gro snyam mo/ / de nas mgon med zas sbyin shin tu 'dzem zhing ngo tsha dang ldan pa'i sems kyis de kho na'i gnas na sdod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ste/ bcom
158b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la 'di su zhig ces smras so// de nas dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa mgon med zas sbyin lags te/ bcom ldan 'das la shin tu mdzem
159a1(mdo sde): zhing ngo tsha dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dag dang thabs cig tu phyag dar te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phyag bdar mdzad pas de /
159a2(mdo sde): steng du sug par brdzis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi bar mi 'tshal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
159a3(mdo sde): rnams ni chos la gus la/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bla ma ni chos yin pas na/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' kha ton gyis la nang du shog cig/ de nas mgon med zas sbyin tshigs su bcad pa brjod
159a4(mdo sde): cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis
159a5(mdo sde): yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// de bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang
159a6(mdo sde): dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas dge
159a7(mdo sde): slong dag the tsom rgyas te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos la zhes skyes shing gus pa skyes te/ chos
159b1(mdo sde): bsngags pa 'ba' zhig gsung ba ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral
159b2(mdo sde): pa/ gti mug dang bral ba/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
159b3(mdo sde): 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa'i tshe/ chos la zhes skyes
159b4(mdo sde): shing gus pa skyes te/ chos kyi sngags pa 'ba' zhig brjod pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug
159b5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las
159b6(mdo sde): yongs su ma grol ba'i tshe'ang ngas chos kyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su gtong ba bya ba de legs par rab tu nyon la yid zung zhig dang ngas bshad do/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
159b7(mdo sde): na/ grong khyer wA ra NA si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do// de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba
160a1(mdo sde): dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram
160a2(mdo sde): shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med ci tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// rgyal po de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/
160a3(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa/ thams cad sbyin pa/
160a4(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go// de nas de phyi zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod
160a5(mdo sde): do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na btsun mo de la bu chags nas/ legs par gsungs pa mnyan par bya'o snyam du yid la 'dod pa skyes te/ des rgyal po la gsol
160a6(mdo sde): to/ / rgyal pos kyang ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste rmas na/ de dag gis kyang lha sems can de'i mthu lags so zhes gsol to// de nas rgyal po des legs par gsungs pa smra ba patsam pa'i phyir//
160a7(mdo sde): gser bye bas grong dang / zong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bskor na/ 'on kyang legs par gsungs pa de ma rnyed nas/ re zhig na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang bu
160b1(mdo sde): byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mdog bzang ba/ gser gyi kha dog can/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes phye ba/ sna
160b2(mdo sde): mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma sdug pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de btsas pa'i tshe btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u'i ming ji skad gdags zhes
160b3(mdo sde): ming 'dogs par byed de/ blon po rnams na re khye'u 'di ma btsas bzhin du legs par gsungs pa tshol bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u'i ming legs par gsungs pa tshol ba zhes bya'o zhes zer nas
160b4(mdo sde): de'i ming legs par gsungs pa tshol ba zhes btags so/ / de nas khye'u legs par gsungs pa tshol ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i
160b5(mdo sde): pam gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad
160b6(mdo sde): par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe'ang legs par gsungs pa btsal te ma rnyed do// de nas de pa shi ba'i
160b7(mdo sde): 'og tu rgyal por bcug nas/ blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ yul gyi gtso bo dag nga la legs par gsungs pa dgos kyis/ nga'i legs par gsungs pa tshol cig ces byas so// de nas blon po
161a1(mdo sde): de dag gis legs par gsungs pa btsal ba'i phyir/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad du gser bye ba bstan kyang / legs par gsungs pa ma rnyed do// de nas de dag gis
161a2(mdo sde): rgyal po la gsol to/ / de nas rgyal po de legs par gsungs pa mnyan par 'dod pa'i phyir gdung zhing yi chad do// lnga'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/ des rgyal
161a3(mdo sde): po legs par gsungs pa ma thos pas 'phongs pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po bgam par bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnod sbyin gyi
161a4(mdo sde): lugs rkang lag dang / mig mi sdug pa zhig tu bsgyur nas/ rgyal po'i mdun du tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ legs spyod chos ni spyad par bya// nyes par spyod pa de mi bya// 'jig rten
161a5(mdo sde): 'di dang pha rol tu/ / chos spyod bde la sten par 'gyur// de nas rgyal po ya mtshan du gyur nas mdangs phyeng ste/ gnod sbyin la smras pa/ gsang ba pa tshigs su bcad pa de bdag gis mnyan
161a6(mdo sde): gyis gsungs gsungs/ de nas gnod sbyin gyis/ rgyal po la smras pa/ gal te bdag ji skad mchi ba bzhin du khyod kyis mdzad na ni/ de'i 'og tu bdag gis kyang bka' ci stsal ba bzhin du
161a7(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ bka' stsal pa ci mchis/ gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/ nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du me dong du seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar nas/ gal te der bdag nyid kyis
161b1(mdo sde): mchod spyod na ni de'i 'og tu khyod la bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa'ang bzlas par bgyi'o/ / rgyal pos de skad thos nas sems dga' bar gyur te/ gnod sbyin de la smras pa/ de ltar bgyi'o//
161b2(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos gnod sbyin dam gyi 'og tu bcug nas/ yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te deng nas zhag bdun na rgyal po legs par gsungs pa mnyan pa'i phyir me dong du bdag nyid mchod par
161b3(mdo sde): chad kyis/ khyed kyi nang nas gang rmad du byung ba mthong 'dod pa de dag 'dir shog cig ces byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud par 'dod
161b4(mdo sde): pa dang / rmad du byung ba blta ba'i phyir mi 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa dang / nam mkha' la lha 'bum phrag du ma 'dus te 'khod pa'i nang du gnod sbyin de nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ byang
161b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal po bu thu bo rgyal por dbang bskur nas blon po rnams dang / grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang /
161b6(mdo sde): yul gyi mi rnams la nyes pa bshags te/ skye bo'i tshogs rnams dbugs phyung nas me dong gi drung du song ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// nga ni chos phyir me 'bar nyi ma khrag mdog
161b7(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i mdag ma'i dong / / shas cher 'jigs byed nang du mchong bar sems nges srog phyir 'jigs pa med// me dong 'di ni bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis rdzing bu rab bzang ba/ tsan dan
162a1(mdo sde): 'dam gyis bsgos pa'i chu bsil pad+mas gang bar 'gyur yang thag/ byang chub sems dpas de skad ces smras nas/ me dong de'i nang du mchongs so// mchongs ma thag tu
162a2(mdo sde): de'i me dong de rdzing bu zhig tu gyur to/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mi snang bar byas te/ rang gi gzugs
162a3(mdo sde): su 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ legs spyod chos ni spyad par bya// nyes par spyod pa de mi bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// chos spyod pa de la sten par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems
162a4(mdo sde): dpas tshigs su bcad pa de yid la bzung nas/ gser gyi glegs bam la bris te/ 'dzam bu gling thog thag tu grong dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kun tu bskor to//
162a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ de'i tshe'ang ngas legs par gsungs pa mnyan pa'i phyir
162a6(mdo sde): rang gi srog yongs su btang na da ltar lta ci smos/ dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ste/ chos la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// chos la bkur
162a7(mdo sde): spyibyas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar ba slab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
162b1(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams
162b2(mdo sde): dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tsho dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin
162b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang /
162b4(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
162b5(mdo sde): pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal
162b6(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/
162b7(mdo sde): mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de nas re zhig na mthar gyis gshegs te/ lam po cher zhugs pa dang / bram ze zhig kyang lam po che der 'ongs so// de nas des sangs rgyas
163a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dos gang gis legs
163a2(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu yun ring du brtags nas sa la ri mo bris te/
163a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma bdag la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya ma stsal gyi bar du khyod kyis ri mo 'di mi 'da' gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las chud mi za bar brtan pa dang /
163a4(mdo sde): ma byin par len pa las bzlog pa'i phyir/ sgo skyes btsugs pa bzhin du gzhes so// de nas mnyan du yod pa thog thag tu bcom ldan 'das lam po cher bram ze zhig gis kar sha pa Na lnga brgya'i phyir
163a5(mdo sde): 'gror ma ster ro/ / zhes de skad du gtam grag par gyur to// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos ma thag tu blon po'i tshogs kyis zham ring byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
163a6(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis sbrul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
163a7(mdo sde): po de dag ni khyod kyis sbyin par bya ba ma yin gyi/ de dag ni gzhan zhig gis sbyin dgos so// de bzhin du ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bla drang srong sbyin dang / gna' mi dang /
163b1(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams dang / rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pas kyang gser dngul khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song na de dag la'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag
163b2(mdo sde): ni khyed kyis kyang sbyin par bya ba ma yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ / de nas re zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas gser gyi gzhong pa gser dngul gyis bkang ba'i steng du kar sha
163b3(mdo sde): pa Na lnga brgya bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di bzhes su gsol zhes byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag 'di dag ni khyod kyis
163b4(mdo sde): sbyin par bya ba yin gyis bram ze la byin cig/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gser gyi gzhong pa gang ba de bram ze de la byin no// de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams
163b5(mdo sde): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang gshegs su ma ster nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis kar sha pa Na stsal ba la gzigs
163b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji srid cig nas 'di'i bu lon chags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// dge
163b7(mdo sde): slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA NA si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po
164a1(mdo sde): byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rjod pa dang / 'thab pa zhing dang / 'jug
164a2(mdo sde): pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med
164a3(mdo sde): cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ / de nas phyi zhig na de'i bu rab rgyal tshab byed pa de dpyid kyi dus kyi tshe shing rnams me tog rgyas shing / ngang pa dang /
164a4(mdo sde): ngudur ba dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na blon po'i bu rnams kyis g.yog byas te rtse zhing dga' la dga'
164a5(mdo sde): dgur sprod do/ / de'i grogs po blon po bu zhig yod pa de rgyan po byed pa'i mi gzhan zhig dang lhan cig tu tshe long rtses pa las/ blon po'i bu de mi des kar sha pa Na lnga brgyas pham par byas nas/
164a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i bus kyang de'i gnya' byas pa las de mthu dang ldan te/ nga ni rgyal po'i du'o snyam nas ma byin no// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin
164a7(mdo sde): pa de ni nga yin no/ / blon po'i bu ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yin no// rgya bo byed pa de ni bram ze 'di kho na yin te/ ngas gnya' byas pa las nga ni rgyal po'i bu yin no snyam nas/ rgyan po
164b1(mdo sde): byed pa de la kar sha pa Na ma byin pa des na 'khor ba na longs spyod kyis 'phongs pa mtha' yas pa myong la/ da ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na'ang 'dis bu lon 'das so//
164b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu
164b3(mdo sde): nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams
164b4(mdo sde): spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtid bar bya'o// mabyin par len pa spang ba la'ang 'bad par bya ste/ tsi nas de lta bu'i nyes par mi 'gyur bar dge slong khyed
164b5(mdo sde): kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
164b6(mdo sde): / rab bzang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
164b7(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po
165a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
165a2(mdo sde): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang /

165a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba kho na'i dus kyi tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni do nub nam phyed na phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya

165a6(mdo sde): btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ sAl rung gi bar du gzims khri bshams te/ pangs byang phyogs su bstan nas/

165b2(mdo sde): gzims khri ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ glo g.yas phyogs kyis gzims te zhabs gshibs nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan zhing / mya ngan las 'das
165b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig thugs la dgongs so/ / de'i tshe grong khyer ku shi na kun tu rgyu rab bzang zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ de rgas te rnyis shing 'khongs la/ skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon te/ grong
165b4(mdo sde): khyer ku shi na 'khod pa'i gyad yul pa rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dgra bcom par 'dzin to// de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma do nub/

165b6(mdo sde): the tsom yang yod la/ go'u ta ma des bdag gi som nyi bsal nus pa'i re ba'ang bdag la yod do snyam nas thos ma thag tu grong khyer ku shir song ste sA la zung ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun

166a1(mdo sde): der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis

166a4(mdo sde): mchis la/ go'u ta ma des bdag gi som nyi de bsal bar nus pa'i re ba'ang bdag la mchis na/ kun dga' bo gal te khyod la'ang gnod pa ma mchis la/ gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs

166b1(mdo sde): mchis/ the tsom yang mchis la/ go'u ta ma des bdag gi som nyid bsal bar nus pa'i re ba'ang ba dag la mchis na/ kun dga' bo gal te khyod la'ang gnod pa ma mchis la/ gal te zhu
166b2(mdo sde): ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs 'byed pa lta na/ bdag nang du mchis te phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'ang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ kun tu rgyu rab
166b3(mdo sde): bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rab bzang bcom ldan 'das sku mnyel te/ bde bar gshegs pa sku 'o brgyal gyis/ rab bzang thong la bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ma byed cig ces

166b5(mdo sde): bdag gis thos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni brgya lam brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar zad de/ dper na u dum wa ra'i me tog
166b6(mdo sde): dang 'dra'o zhes grag la/ go'u ta ma de'ang do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur na/ bdag chos rnams la

167a1(mdo sde): te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs 'byed pa lta na/ bdag nang du mchis te phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ kun du rgyu rab bzang

167a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang skabs su gtam glengs pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas gsan to// gsan nas kyang tshe dang

167a5(mdo sde): can kun tu rgyu dag dang skabs su gtam gleng ba'i tha ma yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di ni nga'i mngon sum gyi nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag tshur shog/ tshangs par spyod cig
167a6(mdo sde): ces bya ba'i tha ma'ang yin no/ / de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/ dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste/ yi rangs nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes pas//

167b3(mdo sde): bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu dang / 'di rnams rang rang gis dam bcas pa rtogs pa lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ nga ni lo
167b4(mdo sde): grangs nyi shu dgu lon nas/ / dge ba gang yin tshol phyir rab tu byung // rab bzang nga ni rab tu byung nas kyang // de yi phyin chad lo ni lnga bcu gcig/ tshul khrims ting 'dzin rkang pa reg pa rnams// /
167b5(mdo sde): ngas ni rtse gcig sems kyis rab tu bsgoms// rigs pa'i chos kyi phyogs tsam smra ba yang // 'di las phyi rol dge sbyong gzhan la med// rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i
167b6(mdo sde): lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa de la ni dge sbyong dang po'ang med do/ / de la ni dge sbyong gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'ang med do// rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags
167b7(mdo sde): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod pa de la ni dge sbyong dang po'ang yod do/ / dge sbyong gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'ang yod do// rab bzang chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la ni 'phags pa'i
168a1(mdo sde): lam yan lag brgyad pa yod pas na/ dge sbyong dang po'ang 'di la yod do// gnyis pa'ang 'di la yod do// gsum pa'ang 'di la yod do// bzhi pa'ang 'di la yod do/
168a2(mdo sde): 'di las phyi rol pa la ni dge sbyong dang bram ze med la/ phas kyi rgol ba dag ni dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze rnams kyis ston ste/ nga ni 'dir 'khor gyi nang du de skad ces yang dag par seng ge'i
168a3(mdo sde): sgra sgrogs so/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes te/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis chos mthong / chos rnyed//
168a4(mdo sde): chos rtogs/ chos kyi gting bslebs/ som nyi las brgal/ the tsom las brgal nas/ ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing / gzhan gyis dkri ba med de/ chos rnams
168a5(mdo sde): la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di
168a6(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa kun dga' bo slob dpon chen pos slob dpon chen po'i nye gnas kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de ni/ btsun pa kun dga' bos rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//
168a7(mdo sde): gcig tu ni bdag gis kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so//

168b2(mdo sde): rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur bar 'tshal lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/

168b5(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar byed pa'i tshangs par spyod pa bla na med pa'i mthar thug pa de tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te khong du chud la/ bdag gi skye ba ni zad do//

171a5(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas/ / de thar pa la rang dbang yod pa tsam du 'dzin to// brtson 'grus ma byas so// re zhig na yun ring mo zhig lon pa'i 'og tu mya ngan med kyis ljongs su dbyar gnas pa dam bcas so//
171a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs yang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du gzims mal gyi tha mar zhugs so// dge
171a7(mdo sde): slong mya ngan med kyang shing mya ngan 'tshang gi drung na nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs so/ / de nas shing mya ngan 'tshang de la gnas pa'i lha des bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
171b1(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srungs yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o zhes thos nas ngu zhing 'dug ste/ de ngu ba'i mchi ma zags pa mya ngan med kyi lus la bab bo// de nas mya ngan med kyis gyen du bltas nas lha dub
171b2(mdo sde): de la smras pa/ lha ci'i phyir du/ lhas smras pa/ do nub nam byed na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o// de nas mya ngan
171b3(mdo sde): med kyis lha'i tshig thos nas/ gnad du phog pa bzhin du yod ces byas te/ de'ang snying rje rje skad du dus so// de nas lhas dris pa/ khyod ci'i phyir du/ mya ngan med kyis smras pa/ nye du dang bral
171b4(mdo sde): ba dang / mkhan po dang bral ba'i phyir te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs ni bdag gi zhang po yin pas/ bdag bsod nams su 'dug 'dug ste/ brtson 'grus ma byas so//
171b5(mdo sde): da ni de lam rings la bdag ni so so'i skye bor lus te/ lam rings pas bdag gis khyad par thob par mi nus so// lhas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du khyod bkrin/ ci
171b6(mdo sde): khyad par thob par nus sam/ mya ngan med kyis smras pa/ 'di ltar bdag gi yid la bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu khyad par thob par 'gyur snyam byed do// de nas lhas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus mya
171b7(mdo sde): ngan med bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du khyer te/ nges bcom ldan 'das mthong nas dga' ba skyes so// dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis gang thos pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
172a1(mdo sde): du byed par 'gyur ba lta bu'i chos bstan nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ thog ma kho nar tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ de'i 'og
172a2(mdo sde): tu bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong nas/ dga' ba
172a3(mdo sde): bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dis khyad par ci thob pa thams cad ni bdag las brten pa yin gyis/ bdag kyang 'di bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
172a4(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya
172a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes lung bstan pa de gzims mal gyi tha mar zhugs pa na/ bdag kyang de'i mngon sum gyi nyan thos tha mar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snga rol tu yongs su mya ngan las
172a6(mdo sde): 'das nas/ de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na lhar gyur pa gang
172a7(mdo sde): yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di yin no/ / dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang / dge ba'i sten dang gnas par bya'i//
172b1(mdo sde): sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i sten dang gnas par mi bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
172b2(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa 'dir bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na/ sems la 'di lta bu'i sems kyi yongs su
172b3(mdo sde): rtog pa byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang / dge ba'i sten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed lags kyi/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sdig
172b4(mdo sde): pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i sten ni de lta ma lags so snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i
172b5(mdo sde): grogs po dang / dge ba'i sten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed yin gyi/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i sten ni de lta ma yin no zhes ma zer cig/ de ci'i
172b6(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang / dge ba'i sten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ril po dang / ma 'dres pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
172b7(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba yin gyi/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i sten ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo dge ba'i
173a1(mdo sde): bshes gnyen la brten nas/ sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba'i chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba
173a2(mdo sde): dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /
173a3(mdo sde): smresmesngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de bas na rnams grangs 'di lo
173a4(mdo sde): nas khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang / dge ba'i sten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ril po dang / ma 'dres pa dang /
173a5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba yin gyi/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i sten ni de lta ma yin no zhes kun
173a6(mdo sde): dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
173a7(mdo sde): bstod do/ / // rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs rnams rdzogs so// /
173b1(mdo sde): sdom ni/ bu ram gnas dang kha zas dang // chu dang byi sa'i snod rnams dang // mo'u 'gal bu dang chu smad dang // dmus long dang ni tshong dpon dang // bu rnams dang ni phyis lung // sde tshan
173b2(mdo sde): dag tu bstan pa yin/ / bu ram 'chir ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang
173b3(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
173b4(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
173b5(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzis
173b6(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/
173b7(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis
174a1(mdo sde): gyis 'di ltar dam bcas te/ sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams kyi nang nas sems can gcig tsam yang thar bar ma byas kyi bar du zan
174a2(mdo sde): mi bza' 'o zhes byas so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa de gnyis dus dus su res 'ga' ni sems can dmyal bar rgyu zhing 'gro'o// res 'ga' ni dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu zhing 'gro'o// res 'ga'
174a3(mdo sde): ni yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing 'gro'o/ / de gnyis kyis der sems can gnod pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa rnams kyi skad ngan thos nas rgyu ba las slar 'khor te/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la rjod
174a4(mdo sde): par byed do/ / de dag gis kyang thos nas skyo bar 'gyur ro// de nas de gnyis kyis de las brten nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos ston par byed de/ des na sems can du mas thos nas khyad/
174a5(mdo sde): bar thob par 'gyur ba dang / chos thos pa dang / gtam bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// phyis re zhig na tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang /
174a6(mdo sde): yi dgas lho na ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ rang gi sgras yog pa/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i
174a7(mdo sde): skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / bshang gcig la yod pa der 'khod la/ de'ang bde blag tu mi rnyed
174b1(mdo sde): pa zhig mthong ngo / / de nas gnas brtan des/ yi dwags de la dris pa/ kye khyod kyis las ci zhig byas nas/ des 'ang lta bu sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang /
174b2(mdo sde): yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas kyis smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / des khyod la bdag gi
174b3(mdo sde): las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las
174b4(mdo sde): bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las
174b5(mdo sde): chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba tshur shog/ 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa
174b6(mdo sde): yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so//
174b7(mdo sde): khyod dag dod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing mtsha mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dgas lto ni ri tsam la
175a1(mdo sde): kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ rang gi sgras yog pa/ byi sa bzhin du dri nga ba/ mchog tu dring ba/ mi sdug pa/ mchog tu mi sdug pa/ zas su phyis 'tshal la/ de'ang
175a2(mdo sde): de blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong lags so/ / yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la// mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug/ rang gi skras ni gdong g.yogs gcer bur mchis
175a3(mdo sde): mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu ring / / de ltar gcer bu smras yog pa// rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin// thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la// ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid// bkres
175a4(mdo sde): pa dang ni skom pa yis/ / dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen// nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong // de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// rab 'jigs sdig
175a5(mdo sde): pa ci bgyis na/ / des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yi dgas de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin
175a6(mdo sde): no/ / de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'o ma legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// mo'u 'gal gyi
175a7(mdo sde): bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi gro khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam
175b1(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa de'i bu ram shing 'chir ba'i gnas grwa lnga brgya yod do/ / de dag tu de bu ram shing 'chir bar byed do// sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang
175b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ re zhig na rang sangs
175b3(mdo sde): rgyas sdug cing 'phongs pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig byung nas/ de snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod
175b4(mdo sde): snyoms la song ngo / / btsun pa de'ang nad khong skam gyis thebs te/ de la sman pas bu ras shing gi khu pA phan par bstan nas/ tshong dpon chen po de'i thad du song ngo // tshong dpon gyis kyang rang
175b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas lus kyang mdzes la/ sems kyang mdzes pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshong dpon gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci bzhed/ rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag buram/
175b6(mdo sde): shing gi khu ba 'dod do// de nas khyim bdag des tshal za zhig la 'phags pa la bu ram shing gi khu ba phul cig ces bsgo nas/ khyim bdag de ni don zhig la phyi rol tu chas so// de nas mi de
175b7(mdo sde): gzhan gyi rdzas la ser sna skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis 'di la bu ram shing gi khu ba byin du zin na phyis kyang 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba gsum gyi g.yang sar
176a1(mdo sde): gzhol ba/ thams cad kyis 'dod par bya ba'i 'gro ba gnyis bor ba/ 'phags pa'i lam rnams thag bsrings pa des sdig pa'i sems bskyed nas/ rang sang
176a2(mdo sde): rgyas de la smras pa/ dge slong lhung bzed tshur byin cig dang / bu ram shing gi khu ba sbyin no zhes byas so// nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes
176a3(mdo sde): pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste/ sdug cing 'phongs pa la snying brtse bas mi de la ngas phan gdags par bya'o snyam nas lhung bzed de byin no// de nas spyod pa ngan zhing snying la rje med pa des de blangs te//
176a4(mdo sde): lkogacig tu song nas gcin gyis bkang ste/ steng du bu ram shing gi khu ba'i dbu bas bkab nas rang sangs rgyas de la phul ba dang / des tshor nas/ des bsams pa/ nyon mongs 'dis sdig
176a5(mdo sde): pa chen po zhig byas kyis med do snyam ste/ de phyogs gcig tu song nas po ste song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshal
176a6(mdo sde): zar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dgas 'di yin te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur la/ da ltar yang yi dgas su gyur nas/ sdug bsngal
176a7(mdo sde): mi bzad pa myong ba yin no/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na ci nas yi dgas de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ltar na las
176b1(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar

176b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldeng dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das

177a1(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po
177a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du
177a3(mdo sde): yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nyin par gnas
177a4(mdo sde): paba'i byi shing zhig gi drung du 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos yi dgas mo zhig gi sgra thos te/ nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing / sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi
177a5(mdo sde): bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste/ kha zas slong zhing grogs mo dag bdag bkres so// grogs mo dag bdag skom mo zhes zer ba thos so// de nas gnas
177a6(mdo sde): brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos yi dgas mo de mthong nas dris pa/ khyod kyis las ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/
177a7(mdo sde): ma sha ra ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / des khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam bi lung sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
177b1(mdo sde): chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos
177b2(mdo sde): ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
177b3(mdo sde): rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
177b4(mdo sde): po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi
177b5(mdo sde): dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dgas mo lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ rang gi skras yog pa/ gcer bu mchis shing nyam thag
177b6(mdo sde): ba'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so// yang gsol pa/ lus chen
177b7(mdo sde): ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ / mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug/ rang gi sgras ni gdong yog gcer bur mchis// mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid// de ltar gcer bu sgras log pa/
178a1(mdo sde): rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin// thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la// ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid// bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis// dub cing sdug bsngal
178a2(mdo sde): dag gis nyen/ / nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par byed// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong // de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na// des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra//
178a3(mdo sde): ba// 'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod
178a4(mdo sde): dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal
178a5(mdo sde): pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
178a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na/
178a7(mdo sde): drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na brten cing bzhugs so// de nas grong khyer wA rA NA si de na/ khyim bdag cig gi chung ma ser sna can 'jungs pa/ yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khwa la'ang gtor
178b1(mdo sde): ma mi ster na/ spong ba gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod de/ de dge sbyong dang / zam ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong na sems kyis sdang bar byed do//
178b2(mdo sde): re zhig na bsod snyoms pa zhig de'i khyim du 'ongs nas/ des de mthong nas ser sna skyes te/ sems kyang sdang bar gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis 'di la bkur sti byas
178b3(mdo sde): na ni/ 'di phyis kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas sdig can des tshe phyi ma'i mi sdug pa khyad du bsad nas/ dge slong de nang du bos te sgo bcad nas sbyang du bcug go/ mang du'ang spros te/ dge
178b4(mdo sde): slong khyod la bkur sti ma yin pa byas pa 'di yin gyis/ phyin chad khyim 'dir ma 'ong zhig ces byas so// de nas de ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des yi dgas su skyes te/ de lta
178b5(mdo sde): bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo / / mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na ci nas yi dag sa mo de'i nyes pa gang yin pa de lta bu dag mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
178b6(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/
178b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / nu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug
179a1(mdo sde): so nam pa dang / mthong 'khod gyi mi rnamapa dang / smon nam sa dang / da pos rgyams dang / lharnams dang/ klu rnams dang / gnod sbyi rnams dang /
179a2(mdo sde): min rnams dang / rnams par rdzing rnams dang / mi 'am cinams dang / 'i rgyun po rnams kyis bslar b+has/ thA sar byas/ risor gyis/ mnod pa byu / dang / rlung /
179a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/
179a4(mdo sde): nabaza' dang / kal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / spyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka/
179a5(mdo sde): lan ta ka gnas pa na brten cing bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang / yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg 'dral rang gi
179a6(mdo sde): sgyurgyas log pa/ sngo ni ri rab tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ mi lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la
179a7(mdo sde): skom gyis gdungs te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzang ba dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams kyang skam par 'gyur
179b1(mdo sde): ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe/ de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de la smras pa/
179b2(mdo sde): kye khyod kyis sdig pa ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ba myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs
179b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa ston par 'gyur te/ de zos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe
179b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi
179b5(mdo sde): ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas
179b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba tshur shog/ 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
179b7(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa
180a1(mdo sde): bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dwags mo sdong po me reg ma 'dra la rang gi sgras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni
180a2(mdo sde): khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ skom gyis gdungs te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang
180a3(mdo sde): mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams kyang skam par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe de'i steng
180a4(mdo sde): du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa zhig mthong lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las
180a5(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba
180a6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
180a7(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig
180b1(mdo sde): rten du byung ngo / / de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na brten cing bzhugs pa na/ der dge slong zhig lam du zhugs nas de skom gyis gdungs te/ khron pa'i drung du
180b2(mdo sde): song nas/ de na bu mo zhig bum pa chus bkang ste 'dug pa la dge slong des smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni skom gyis gdungs kyis/ chu byin cig ces byas na/ yo byad la kun tu 'dzin pa de
180b3(mdo sde): ser sna skyes nas/ dge slong de la smras pa/ dge slong bdag gi bum pa gribs su 'ong gis/ gal te khyod shi na'ang chu mi sbyin no zhes byas so// de nas dge slong de skom gyis gdungs
180b4(mdo sde): bzhin du re thag chad nas song ngo / / de nas bu mo de ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa de lta bus shi nas yi dgas su skyes te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad
180b5(mdo sde): pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug go// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o zhes mo'u 'gal gyi
180b6(mdo sde): bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
180b7(mdo sde): dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // phyi sa'i snron ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
181a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
181a2(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
181a3(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
181a4(mdo sde): bo rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
181a5(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na brten cing bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
181a6(mdo sde): gyi bu chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas te/ zan zos nas zas phyis
181a7(mdo sde): len pa spangs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzegs te/ nyin par gnas pa'i phyir shing zhig gi drung du
181b1(mdo sde): rten cing 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi sgras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam
181b2(mdo sde): ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang /
181b3(mdo sde): yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba phyi sa bzhin du dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba/ zas su phyis za la/ de'ang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
181b4(mdo sde): po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ yi dgas mo la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon sdig pa ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu myong zhing dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
181b5(mdo sde): bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / des khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang
181b6(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/
181b7(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sgrab rtsi ma grol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro nga ldan no chog sbyin to// 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan
182a1(mdo sde): no cog nyan par byed do/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba
182a2(mdo sde): sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod
182a3(mdo sde): gzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las/ der bdag gis yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la gcer bur
182a4(mdo sde): mchis shing rang gi sgras yog pa/ ltolho no ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i
182a5(mdo sde): skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang
182a6(mdo sde): gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa dang / phyi sa bzhin dring zhing mchog tu dring ba/ zas su phyis za ba 'tshal la/ de'ang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa
182a7(mdo sde): zhig mthong lags so/ / yang gsol pa/ nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par byed// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong // gang na phyi sa'i gnas yod pa// der ni sdug bzhin rgyug par bgyid//
182b1(mdo sde): phyis bza' 'am btung snyam mo// de'ang bde blag rnyed mi 'gyur// de mis mi yi 'jig rten du// sdig pa rab 'jigs ci bgyis na// des na sdig pa 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba
182b2(mdo sde): nyams su myong / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par
182b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lags so/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'o na legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA trA si na rang sangs
182b4(mdo sde): rgyas sdug cing 'phongs pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig yod la/ de'ang nad bu can zhig ste/ wA rA NA sir bsod snyoms la song ngo // re zhig na de la sman pas
182b5(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i zas bstan nas/ de tshong dpon zhig ga la 'dug pa der song ba dang / tshong dpon des kyang mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod ci bzhed/ des smras pa/ 'thun pa'i kha zas
182b6(mdo sde): 'dod do/ / de nas tshong dpon des 'phags pa la kha zas 'thun pa phul cig ces mna' ma la bsgo'o// de nas de'i mna' ma ser sna skyes te/ gal te bdag gis deng 'di la kha zas byin du zin
182b7(mdo sde): sang yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ phyogs gcig tu song ste/ lhung bzed phyi sas bkang nas/ steng 'bras chan gyis bkab ste/ rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo// nyan thos
183a1(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste/ des blangs so// blangs nas tshor te/ 'di dri nga ba las na 'dis phyi sas bkang gor
183a2(mdo sde): ma chag go snyam mo/ / de nas bdag nyid chen po des de gzhig tu bor nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mong
183a3(mdo sde): dpon gyi mna' mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo 'di yin te/ des sdig pa'i las de lta bu byas nas/ de phyin chad rtag tu sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas
183a4(mdo sde): rnams su skyes te/ rtag tu zas su byis ma par gyur to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar
183a5(mdo sde): mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
183a6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhes bya ba ni/
183a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
183b1(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar
183b2(mdo sde): byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
183b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gso sa dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan
183b4(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi ni pha rol/ 'od ma'i tshal gyi ni chu
183b5(mdo sde): rol/ de'i bar skabs na/ yi dgas sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi sgras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/
183b6(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba
183b7(mdo sde): nyams su myong ba lnga brgya khwa khyus lding ba bzhin du nam mkha' la 'khor te/ gang du yang 'dug sa mi rnyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos
184a1(mdo sde): te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ba dang / des yi dgas de dag mthong ngo // si dgas de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa moru
184a2(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po mthong ngo / / de nas de dag gcig tu 'dril nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du dong ste/ phyin nas snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti
184a3(mdo sde): zhing smra bas 'thun par smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu bdag cag ni rgyal po'i khab tu tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyur te/ bdag cag ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams la kun tu 'dzin
184a4(mdo sde): par gyur nas/ bdag cag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/ gzhan dag sbyin pa byed pa la yang bgegs byas so// sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la yang yi dgas kyi tshig lta bus mang du spros te/
184a5(mdo sde): khyod ni yi dgas su skyes pa bzhin du gzhan gyi khyim phyi nyug pa'o zhes byas so// des na bdag cag shi ba'i 'og tu 'di lta bu'i yi dgas su skyes so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de
184a6(mdo sde): bas na/ bdag cag gi nye du rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa de dag la bdag cag gi las kyi rnam par shes par mdzad la dad pa dris te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos
184a7(mdo sde): gsol nas/ bdag cag gi slad du yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig/ 'on tang bdag cag yi dgas kyi skye gnas las thar kyang srid do zhes gsungs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
184b1(mdo sde): gyi bus kyang yi dgas rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus de dag gi nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas/ phyid nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa
184b2(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs so/ / yi dgas rnams la'ang sbran te/ sang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs kyis/ khyed kyang der shog cig
184b3(mdo sde): ces byas so/ / de dag gi nye du rnams la'ang khyed kyang shog cig dang / nye du'i mchod rten byed pa der yi dgas de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu nyid
184b4(mdo sde): mchod ston gyi zhal ta byed pa la zhugs so/ / de nas nam nangs nas zhal zas bshams te/ gdugs tshod la bab na yi dgas de dag mi snang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
184b5(mdo sde): lha'i mig gis yi dgas de dag bsams na/ yul ma ga d+ha thog thag na'ang mi snang ngo // mthar gyis gling bzhi'i bar du bltas na'ang de na'ang mi snang ngo // de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes
184b6(mdo sde): mthong ba 'jug pa de ji srid du bltas kyang de na'ang mi snang ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
184b7(mdo sde): bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams mi gda' lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu thong la/ khyod mi dgar ma byed cig/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
185a1(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag yod de/ de dag tu las kyi rlung gis 'phangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang mo'u 'gal gyi deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la
185a2(mdo sde): ltos shig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mngon par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'ang bstan gyis/ gaN+DI rdungs shig/ de nas gaN+DI brdungs pa
185a3(mdo sde): dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus/ yi dgas kyi nye du rnams dang yi dgas mthong bar 'dod pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang ltad mo la lhags te 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan
185a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis ci nas yi dgas rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi phyir nye du rnams kyis sangs rgyas
185a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang
185a6(mdo sde): ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang // de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin sngo// yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de dag myur du thar gyur cig/ ces gsungs
185a7(mdo sde): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gzhi de las brten te/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas ser sna'i dri ma spangs te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur to//
185b1(mdo sde): yi dgas de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid
185b2(mdo sde): kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dgas las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
185b3(mdo sde): bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems/ bdag cag zhag lon te
185b4(mdo sde): gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo// de nas sngon yi dgas su
185b5(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdung kor dag cing mgul par thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma
185b6(mdo sde): dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ 'od
185b7(mdo sde): ma'i tshal bya ka lan nga ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug bod chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//
186a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de dang
186a2(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob bo// de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
186a3(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ / der bcom ldan 'das kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis yi dgas mang ngo
186a4(mdo sde): dag lha'i nang du bkod nas/ de dag kyang mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ de dag la ngas chos bstan nas/ de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de mtho bar 'gyur ba rnyed nas dong ba de ni khyod kyis
186a5(mdo sde): zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te/ legs so lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi nye dro rnams la'ang shes par byas te/ de dag gis thos nas
186a6(mdo sde): mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas bkur sti byas so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ci nas yi dgas de dag gi nyes pa de lta bu dag mi
186a7(mdo sde): 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang /
186b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // chu
186b2(mdo sde): smad ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
186b3(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
186b4(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
186b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang /
186b6(mdo sde): spyan zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshwal byA ka lan ta ka gnas pa nA rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi
186b7(mdo sde): grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas
187a1(mdo sde): pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dkur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma
187a2(mdo sde): la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u zhig btsas nas/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par
187a3(mdo sde): byed de/ de nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di rgyu skar du smad la btsas pas nA/ de'i phyir ming chu smad ces gdags so zhes zer nas/ de'i ming rgyu spyad ces btags so// de nas khye'u chu smra
187a4(mdo sde): bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas/ de'i pha shi ba dang / rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to// de nas des tshong dus bkram nas nyo tshong byed cing nyo tshong gis 'tsho bar byed pa las/ de'i nyin gcig
187a5(mdo sde): bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ de bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos thos pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur nas/ de rab tu 'byung ba'i sems
187a6(mdo sde): skyes te/ des ma la gsol ba btab pa/ yum ba dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig/ de nas de'i mas smras pa/ bu khyod ni bu gcig pa yin
187a7(mdo sde): gyis/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rab tu ma 'byung zhig/ bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bya ba byos shig ces zer ro// chu smad des kyang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/ yum 'dis
187b1(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces byas so// de'i ma de brkam chags can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa
187b2(mdo sde): zhig ste/ kar sha pa Na dag sbas nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de/ khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgyu zhing khyed ni yi dgas su skyes pa bzhin du khyim phyi nyug cing slong ngo
187b3(mdo sde): zhes zer ro/ / bu de la'ang slu bar byed de bdag gis nyin gcig bzhin du/ dge slong 'di snyed 'di snyed cig la zan byin no zhes zer ro// phyis re zhig na de shi ba dang / de yi dgas su skyes nas
187b4(mdo sde): bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed de/ sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad
187b5(mdo sde): pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ / 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i
187b6(mdo sde): chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser
187b7(mdo sde): dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/ ris pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon
188a1(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
188a2(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur nas/ des chu klung gad+hA'i 'gram du lo mo'i skyil po byas te bsam gtan byed do// de'i ma yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes
188a3(mdo sde): pa de'ang sdong dum me reg sa 'jal/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi sgras yog pa/ ma tsam la/ la ni lab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ mo
188a4(mdo sde): gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nu smad kyi thad du song nas/ re zhig na tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dgas mo de mthong nas dris pa/ 'di kho na 'dra ba
188a5(mdo sde): khyod su zhig/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu gcig gang las btsas pa yi/ byams pa'i ma ni bdag yin te/ zas dang skom dang bral ba yi// yi dwags rnams kyi nang du skyes// bdag ni na
188a6(mdo sde): ba'i dus 'das nas/ / lo grangs nyi shu sA lon te// chu yi bag kyang ma mthong na// kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong // 'bras bu ldan pa'i shing rnams kyi// drung song de dag 'bras med 'gyur/
188a7(mdo sde): gang ba'i mtsho 'gras bdag song yang // de dag kyang ni rnam par 'gyur// btsun pa'i shing drung bde ba lags// khyod kyi snod nang chu yang bsil// bkren pa bdag la thugs rje skyed/
188b1(mdo sde): skom gyis gdungs kyis chab stsol cig/ de nas chu smad kyis/ ma la smras pa/ yum khyod mir gyur pa'i tshe/ bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gas/ yi dgas
