188b2(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni ser snas non pas sbyin pa dag kyang ma byin/ bsod nams dag kyang ma byas te/ nor rnyed pa de dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbas so// bu
188b3(mdo sde): gcig de bas na dad pa dris la bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig/ 'on tang bdag yi dgas kyi skye gnas nas
188b4(mdo sde): thar kyang srid do/ / chu smad kyis smras pa/ de ltar bgyis khyod kyang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug cig/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni gcer bur 'dug pas ngo tsha ste ngo mi thub bo//
188b5(mdo sde): chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa de'i tshe ngo mi tsha na/ da ltar 'bras bu myong ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo tsha/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ 'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o// de nas
188b6(mdo sde): ru smad kyis nyo du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dang pa dris nas/ byid nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs nas/ gdugs tshod la bab pa na/ sangs rgyas la sogs
188b7(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag kyang 'dus/ yi dgas mo de'ang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa rnams kyis yi dgas mo de mthong ngo // de dag gis
189a1(mdo sde): yi dgas mo de'i lus mi sdug pa mthong nas/ shin tu skyo ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la
189a2(mdo sde): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ yi dgas mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs gdon par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang
189a3(mdo sde): ldan pas sbyin pa'i rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang // de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur du thar gyur cig/ ces gsu
189a4(mdo sde): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas yi dgas mo de dang / skye bo mang po la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du mas de thos nas bden pa mthong bar
189a5(mdo sde): gyur to/ / yi dgas mo de'ang sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so// tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis kyang yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes par shes so// de nas
189a6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum 'di na mthu yod kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba dag gyis shig/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba med de mi
189a7(mdo sde): nus so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/ chags pa'i mun pas mig ni rab bsgribs te/ khyod kyis yi dgas 'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi/
189b1(mdo sde): khyod kyi dus bu chen po sha med pa// rus pa pags pa spyi rnams da dung 'dug/ ces byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa nu smad kyis lan mang du spyos te smras nas/ de'i tshe 'og tu de las ras zung
189b2(mdo sde): gcig thob bo/ / de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun la phul nas/ gang gis dge 'dun la ras zung gcig po nyos pa'i dge slong des gos kyi gdang le bzhag go// de nas yi dgas mo de
189b3(mdo sde): mtshan mo 'ongs nas brkus so/ / de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas/ chu smad song ste yi dgas mo spros nas phyir bkug ste byin no// de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du
189b4(mdo sde): dge slong de las brkus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang / dge slong des kyang de gshags nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la klan to// de nas
189b5(mdo sde): de phyin chad ma brkus so/ / de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser sna mtho 'tsham par byed pa mthong nas/ ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/
189b6(mdo sde): ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
189b7(mdo sde): 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // dmus long zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
190a1(mdo sde): 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / phozang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
190a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
190a3(mdo sde): byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
190a4(mdo sde): 'das bsod rnams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
190a5(mdo sde): pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos
190a6(mdo sde): bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo // mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ lhung bzed dang chos
190a7(mdo sde): gos bzhag/ yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/ dmus long du 'dug pa/ rang gi sgras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha
190b1(mdo sde): ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba/ khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing bcad cing za ba dang / de gnad la bab ste/
190b2(mdo sde): dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed
190b3(mdo sde): mi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa/ sring mo khyod kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas nas/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na
190b4(mdo sde): sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur
190b5(mdo sde): ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma
190b6(mdo sde): bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston to/ / 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das la chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs
190b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
191a1(mdo sde): ldan pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / dga' byed tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ dga' byed kyis gsol pa/
191a2(mdo sde): btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/ dmus long du mchis pa/ rang gi sgras yog pa/ lho ni ri tsam la kha ni
191a3(mdo sde): khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba/ khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs kun nas sha bkum zhing bkum zhing 'tshal ba dang / de gnang
191a4(mdo sde): la bab ste/ dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so//
191a5(mdo sde): yang gsol ba/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la// mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug/ rang gi sgras ni gdong yog gcer bur mchis// mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu ring //
191a6(mdo sde): de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa// rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin// thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la// ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid// bkres pa dang ni sgom pa yis// dub
191a7(mdo sde): cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen/ / nyan thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong // de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na// des ni
191b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ / 'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa
191b2(mdo sde): nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// dga' byed 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
191b3(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
191b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med da/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA
191b5(mdo sde): rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ / de nas grong khyer wA rA NA si de na/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/ des chos thos nas 'khor ba la
191b6(mdo sde): nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du blta bar gyur te/ nges pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis
191b7(mdo sde): dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas de de na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las/ re zhig na des bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab pa'i gzhi la lhod par byas
192a1(mdo sde): so/ / de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do// de nas des sbyin bdag khyim pa dag rnams dad pas nges par 'bul ba'ang gcod du
192a2(mdo sde): bcug/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa'ang brjod/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag mthong na'ang mig btsums te 'dug go/ dga'
192a3(mdo sde): byed ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang la ser sna byas pa des ni yi dgas su skyes so// des nar ma bcad pa des ni
192a4(mdo sde): khA dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor to// de slob pa mi slob pa dge slong rnams bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas na de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to// dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan
192a5(mdo sde): pa rnams mthong na/ mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to// dga' byed de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par
192a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dga'
192a7(mdo sde): byed de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dga' byed khyod kyis de
192b1(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags sa yas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// der bcom ldan rangs kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
192b2(mdo sde): slong dag ser sna dang ngag gis nyes par spyod pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de
192b3(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
192b4(mdo sde): po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
192b5(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / nged dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
192b6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa
192b7(mdo sde): byas te/ lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod/
193a1(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi
193a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon
193a3(mdo sde): phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig na rgyal bu
193a4(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / / de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas
193a5(mdo sde): pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
193a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes
193a7(mdo sde): par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du blta bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ kun la grags pa dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur te/
193b1(mdo sde): gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur to// des yongs su bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cog sogs par byed de/ des tshangs pa
193b2(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas so/ / de nas ser sna kun tu bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des na/ rang gi yo byad lhag par zhe na bzhin du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du yi
193b3(mdo sde): dgas su skyes so/ / de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gaN+DI mjug med pa brdungs nas rus bu phyir phyung ngo // de nas de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas/ phyir gtsug lag khang
193b4(mdo sde): du lhags so/ / de nas gnas khang gi sgo phye ste chos gos dang / lhung bzed g.yar snga 'drim pa la zhugs pa dang / re zhig na yi dgas rkang lag dang mig mi sdug la/ lus mchog tu 'jigs la chos gos
193b5(mdo sde): dang / lhung bzed zin cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo // de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas/ dge slong dag mi dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi
193b6(mdo sde): bu de la phan gdags pa dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams skyob bskyed pa dang / ser sna'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge
193b7(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar te/ gnas der gshegs so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/
194a1(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
194a2(mdo sde): ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes te/ de ngo tsha bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur zab pa dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i
194a3(mdo sde): gsung gis yi dgas de spros te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/ des na yi dgas su skyes pa yin gyis/ da yang nga la sems
194a4(mdo sde): dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la'ang sems ma chags par byas dang legs so/ / 'di las kyang shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye re/ de nas yi dgas des chos gos dang lhung bzed dge
194a5(mdo sde): 'dun la phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa bshags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dgas kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod
194a6(mdo sde): nams gang / / de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur du thar gyur cig/ de nas yi dgas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas
194a7(mdo sde): yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so/ / de nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po rnacha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus ngo shal dang se mo ngos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod
194b1(mdo sde): pan lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams
194b2(mdo sde): kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi
194b3(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo // de'i tshe dge slong srong dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed
194b4(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / / de mthong nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
194b5(mdo sde): mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
194b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po 'am/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ yi dgas de shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul
194b7(mdo sde): chen por skyes te/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/ de dga' ba skyes nas song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong dpon las yi dgas su gyur pa de'i nyes
195a1(mdo sde): pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ dge sbyong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
195a2(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
195a3(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do/ / / bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi ni
195a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lnga rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci
195a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
195a6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan
195a7(mdo sde): dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i lab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so//
195b1(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo // rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas
195b2(mdo sde): nas zan zos te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhag ste/ yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba dang / des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i nyen kor du yi dgas mo gshin rje'i
195b3(mdo sde): srin mo 'dra la lus khrag gis bshos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug bzhin ke ba rus kyis bskor ba/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod bzhin
195b4(mdo sde): du de bkres pas nyen nas de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo / / de nas gnas brtan 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon las tsa zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal
195b5(mdo sde): myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/
195b6(mdo sde): de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag
195b7(mdo sde): 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan
196a1(mdo sde): 'dag las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ sbran par gsung bya/ nur shog 'ongs pa
196a2(mdo sde): legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam du sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 'dam du sbyin gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa
196a3(mdo sde): legs so/ / khyod da gdod ga las longs/ 'dam du sbyin gyi dus gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis
196a4(mdo sde): yi dgas mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la/ lus khrog gis bshos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug pa bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba zhig mthong lags so// yang gsol pa/ bdag
196a5(mdo sde): ni nyin bzhin bu lnga btsa'/ / mtshan yang de bzhin lnga btsa' ste// btsas nas de dag zos na yang // 'grangs par mi 'gyur zhes mchin// de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ rab 'jigs
196a6(mdo sde): sdig pa ci bgyis na/ / des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa'i
196a7(mdo sde): las byed byed pa yin no/ / de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so// 'dam bu sprin gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas
196b1(mdo sde): bshad do/ / 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA rA NA sin tshong 'apon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam
196b2(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse
196b3(mdo sde): zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang du'ang med/ bu mo'ang med de/ de lag pa la skom tshugs bcas nas/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas/
196b4(mdo sde): bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang /
196b5(mdo sde): chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la'ang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi
196b6(mdo sde): lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos 'thun pa pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la'ang
196b7(mdo sde): gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de'ang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i
197a1(mdo sde): rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa
197a2(mdo sde): las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum
197a3(mdo sde): tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ des lha mnyes par byas kyang bu'ang ma byung / bu mo'ang ma byung nas/ de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/ ma la bdag gis chun ma zhig blangs na/
197a4(mdo sde): la bu yod par 'gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa
197a5(mdo sde): las phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo bdag la sras chags te/ bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa
197a6(mdo sde): las na/ khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so// de'ang dga' ches te/ ro stod ni bteg/ lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/ bdag gis yun ring po nas
197a7(mdo sde): smor smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo / / bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig/ mi rung bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig/ gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig/
197b1(mdo sde): nor gyi skal ba la spyod par shog cig/ bdag gi rigs brgyud ring du gnas par shog cig/ bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu'ang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung / nyung yang rung ste/
197b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa dag byin la/ bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song zhig ces yon sngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do// de nas des bu
197b3(mdo sde): chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan
197b4(mdo sde): pa'i zas rnams dang / ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang dang ra ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro/
197b5(mdo sde): tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ba ska ba ma yin pa rnams dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / dang ra ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do
197b6(mdo sde): shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi
197b7(mdo sde): la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci'ang mi thos par byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gces par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te bsams pa/
198a1(mdo sde): gal te 'di las bu btsas par gyur na ni/ bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos so snyam mo// 'dod pa la yongs su bsten pa la
198a2(mdo sde): ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci'ang med de/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha bltas pa/ des yid rton du bcug nas gang 'thungs pa tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'phyel bar 'gyur
198a3(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin no/ / de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma snga ma de zhal lce la bkug ste/ khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug pas mngal drug pa'i rtsa
198a4(mdo sde): byin te/ des bdag gi bu 'brel to zhes byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du mna' bor te/ gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin par gyur na bdag yi dgas
198a5(mdo sde): nomonor gyur te bu byung ngo cog za bar shog cig ces byas so/ / 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog
198a6(mdo sde): byas pa des na yi dgas mor skyes so/ / des brdzun byas te mna' bor bu'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des ni nyin mo dang nub mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing za bar gyur to// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu de bas na khyod
198a7(mdo sde): kyis ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
198b1(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam du sbyin gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag
198b2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / // phyis khung zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po
198b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
198b4(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang /
198b5(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po
198b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na/
198b7(mdo sde): spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs shig gi nang na/ yi dgas zas su skyugs ba zab/
199a1(mdo sde): bor ba za ba/ ngar snabs dang gcin gyis 'tsho ba/ nag dang / khrag dang / phyis za ba/ mi bzad pa/ rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba lnga brgya gnas so// yang smras pa
199a2(mdo sde): skyugs pa za zhing bor ba za/ / ngar snabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang // rnag khrag dang ni phyis za// mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug/ yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/ des reg
199a3(mdo sde): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse bzhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to//
199a4(mdo sde): de nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re 'di ni lto na khye'u 'dug pa de'i mthu yin no zhes zer ro// re zhig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u mdog
199a5(mdo sde): ngangan cing blta na mi sdug la byad ngan po lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig btsas so/ / de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi/ byams pa'i dbang gis 'brel pas pha ma gnyis kyis gsos so//
199a6(mdo sde): de mi gtsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ba' zhig tu dga' la/ phyag dar gyi phung po dang / phyi sa khung du sku 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'dzud nas/ de'i ming phyi sa khung zhes bya bar gyur to// re zhig na
199a7(mdo sde): de phan tshun du 'khyab pa las 'od srungs rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams su dga' ba las 'di ni gor ma chag par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis/
199b1(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di rab tu dbyung ngo snyam mo// des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam zhing 'dug la/ legs pa byed pa la'ang gnas so// de nas de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs
199b2(mdo sde): kyi nang na yi dgas lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel bas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de/ dga' bar gyur
199b3(mdo sde): nas grogs por gyur to/ / phyis re zhig na khye'u phyi sa khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'o bas der byon nas yi dgas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
199b4(mdo sde): 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
199b5(mdo sde): mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas/ bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cis
199b6(mdo sde): 'phongs/ yi dgas rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni skom lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste/
199b7(mdo sde): des yi dgas lnga brgya po de dag tshib par mdzad do// de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo
200a1(mdo sde): skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dgas las
200a2(mdo sde): shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam
200a3(mdo sde): du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon te/ gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo// /
200a4(mdo sde): de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul ba thogs/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma
200a5(mdo sde): la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/
200a6(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan
200a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
200b1(mdo sde): bstan pa de thos nas/ lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas tshong pa la
200b2(mdo sde): spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar byed pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i
200b3(mdo sde): 'byor pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / / de nas khye'u phyis khung grong khyer gyi 'obs su 'ongs pa dang / yi dgas de dag ma mthong ngo // de nas
200b4(mdo sde): tshol ba la zhugs te de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do/ / de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/
200b5(mdo sde): thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/
200b6(mdo sde): med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/
200b7(mdo sde): chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu
201a1(mdo sde): mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin/
201a2(mdo sde): pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
201a3(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum
201a4(mdo sde): mtshan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni 'phongs pa dang /
201a5(mdo sde): nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag
201a6(mdo sde): par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa
201a7(mdo sde): bab rnams ma skyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/
201b1(mdo sde): 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas
201b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyi sa khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi
201b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdang nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re zhig na mthar gyis bsod snyoms bskor te srang du gshegs na/ phyis lung yang phan tshun 'khor 'khor
201b4(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'greng ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad
201b5(mdo sde): cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de'i mod la des
201b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas so/ / de dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bdag cag
201b7(mdo sde): lta bu'ang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba mchis te/ chud par gyur na bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/
202a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal mkhyen pas/ de shin tu skal ba dang ldan par thugs su chud nas phyug glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste
202a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / dge slong tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/ sgra dang kha spu ni bregs nas/ zhag bdun lon
202a3(mdo sde): pa tsam du gyur/ spyod las ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur pa/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur
202a4(mdo sde): shog bka' stsal pas/ / de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon// sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas// mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
202a5(mdo sde): de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas pho la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
202a6(mdo sde): cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra
202a7(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur
202b1(mdo sde): bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur
202b2(mdo sde): sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na'ang ngan pa la dga'
202b3(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ nga'i dge slong phyis khung 'di ni nyan thos kyi dge slong ngan ngon la mos pa rnams
202b4(mdo sde): kyi mchog yin no/ / de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gnas brtan phyis khung gis las ci bgyis na des 'di
202b5(mdo sde): lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag phyi sa khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa'
202b6(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ phyis khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur
202b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi
203a1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la smin par 'gyur ro// sus
203a2(mdo sde): can dag gi las rnams ni/ / bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// rdzogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
203a3(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa
203a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho
203a5(mdo sde): brang mdzes ldan zhes bya ba de na rten cing bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong
203a6(mdo sde): ngag 'ongs pa dang / 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so// gtsug lag khang de na so so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/ de'ang gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ong ba
203a7(mdo sde): rnams mthong na/ tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de/ zhul zhul por 'dug cing 'khrug pa skyed par byed do// dge slong gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/
203b1(mdo sde): shas cher dga' zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing smra bar byed do// phyis re zhig na ga zhig gi yul nas dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongs so// gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de'ang phyir mi 'ong ba
203b2(mdo sde): yin te/ des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin par shes so// de nas dga' ba skyes te/ phyid nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la sman drangs so//
203b3(mdo sde): dge slong gzhi pa de ni de na med pa las re zhig na phyid nyin cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul/ bshos kyang bshams pa dang / dge slong gzhi pa de'ang 'ongs te/ de'ang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar song
203b4(mdo sde): nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed rengs su byung ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas de phrag dog skyes nas des sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las
203b5(mdo sde): rtsub po smras te/ dge slong khyod ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang bla'i/ sbyin bdag 'di lta bu'i bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs 'di las
203b6(mdo sde): chos mi bzang ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ cang mi der bar ngang du blangs so// re zhig na tshogs par gyur te dro la bab pa dge slong gzhi pa des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i
203b7(mdo sde): sems bskyed do zhes zer ba thos so/ / thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so// de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po smras pa de
204a1(mdo sde): bzod pa gsol lo zhes byas so/ / de nas dgra bcom pa des de dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas lhag par yang
204a2(mdo sde): 'gyod pa skyes te/ des de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing bshags te shad kyis sbyangs so// 'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskyed ni ma nus so// de nas re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus
204a3(mdo sde): la bab pa dang / des smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa de'i las de'i rnam par smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar
204a4(mdo sde): ma gyur cig/ bdag gis bklags pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des
204a5(mdo sde): ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par shog cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhi par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyi
204a6(mdo sde): sa khung 'di nyid yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur te/ las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas/
204a7(mdo sde): de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe rang 'di ltar dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga bar gyur la/ mi gtsang ba dang snyag snyig la dga' bar gyur to// de nas kha ton byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams
204b1(mdo sde): la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/
204b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thabs cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi
204b3(mdo sde): sa khung so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dge slong khyed kyis
204b4(mdo sde): de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lnga dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho
204b5(mdo sde): 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rdzogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcang ba lnga
204b6(mdo sde): rdzogs so/ / sdom ni/ sbrul nag dang ni sra ba dang // sbrul dang ni dpal ldan pa// gos dang no pa yang // ma he dang ni gas sbyong dang // dngang thamar brjod pa yin/
204b7(mdo sde): / sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyag po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
205a1(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams
205a2(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
205a3(mdo sde): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun
205a4(mdo sde): gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab
205a5(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de'ang ser
205a6(mdo sde): sna can 'dungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khwa la'ang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong na sems sdang bar byed do//
205a7(mdo sde): de nas des rang gi skyed mos tshal du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po sbas te bzhag nas/ de de la chags te lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o// de shi nas de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po mig
205b1(mdo sde): / gdug pa zhig tu skyes so// de nas skyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog thag tu'ang che ge mo'i skyed mos tshal du song ba
205b2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad rlag par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur to/ / skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs
205b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par de 'dul nus pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/
205b4(mdo sde): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam
205b5(mdo sde): gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag
205b6(mdo sde): par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po gzugs cas snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
205b7(mdo sde): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
206a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/ skye bo mang po rlag par bgyid lags na/ bcom
206a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom
206a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ stan las langs nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das
206a4(mdo sde): nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag
206a5(mdo sde): pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad snang bar byas so// bskal pa stong gi bar du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la
206a6(mdo sde): phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to/ / de nas sbrul gdug pa des phan tshun du bltas te/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur cig gu snyam pa dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
206a7(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po
206b1(mdo sde): cha'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / / mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang
206b2(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par ltung bar byas so// da'ang nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la gter 'di la'ang sems ma
206b3(mdo sde): chags par byas dang legs so/ / 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skye'o re/ de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa de'i tshe de dus so// de nas
206b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la// da ni nga yis ci byar med// mi lom par ni skyes zin gyis// don med ngus pas ci la phan// 'di
206b5(mdo sde): ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ / nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs// 'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul de lhung bzed kyi
206b6(mdo sde): nang du bcug ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du bsnams so// 'di'i skabs su rgyal po dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos so// de nas sbrul
206b7(mdo sde): gdug pa de rang gi lus la smad de kha 'chos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas
207a1(mdo sde): ring po malon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes// las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas sbrul gdug pa las shi
207a2(mdo sde): 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul ba zang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems
207a3(mdo sde): te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon sprul
207a4(mdo sde): gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i
207a5(mdo sde): lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+dA ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ 'od ma'i
207a6(mdo sde): tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas
207a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
207b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
207b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang // mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /
207b3(mdo sde): ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la pas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis
207b4(mdo sde): rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge slong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang
207b5(mdo sde): ma bgyi sa lags so/ / yang smras pa// nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i
207b6(mdo sde): lam yang bdag gis thob/ / bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i
207b7(mdo sde): go 'phang thob/ / mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal
208a1(mdo sde): 'phyang ba dgar gyur te/ / btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon
208a2(mdo sde): sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa le spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang
208a3(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i thad du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/
208a4(mdo sde): rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po longs/ nyal te ci bya/ de nas rgyal po gnyid sad de 'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu
208a5(mdo sde): ste khyod su zhig ces dris so/ / de ni re bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul gdug pa btul te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin te/
208a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la'ang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// da bdag gi khyod la bstan gyis/ khyod song la/ skyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas
208a7(mdo sde): gter chen po phyung la bdag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te/ yon gyi rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying
208b1(mdo sde): pos lha'i bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so/ / de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
208b2(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+ha'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams la bsgo nas skyed mos tshal der song ste gter phyung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
208b3(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des
208b4(mdo sde): sbrul gdug par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des shas cher chags pa
208b5(mdo sde): bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa des ni sbrul gdug par skyes so// nga la sems dga' bar byas
208b6(mdo sde): pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes so/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des ni bden pa
208b7(mdo sde): mthong bar gyur to/ / rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid lha'i bur
209a1(mdo sde): gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
209a2(mdo sde): mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge
209a3(mdo sde): slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang /
209a4(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
209a5(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu
209a6(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
209a7(mdo sde): ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal
209b1(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhing pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung
209b2(mdo sde): ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu//
209b3(mdo sde): byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim par byed pa zhig btsas so// de'ang bram ze des dka' bas rnyed pa yin te/ de la bu dang bu mo
209b4(mdo sde): gzhan yang med nas/ de bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas/ de 'jig rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes btags so// de
209b5(mdo sde): nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong khyer thams cad du brgyud de/ bskor bas bram ze de'ang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur te/ 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag gi tshe'ang rtag tu leg
209b6(mdo sde): par bsrung ba lhur byed cing 'dug go/ / bram ze de'i khyim yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang le ba zhig na 'dug go// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang
209b7(mdo sde): bsten nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/ de'ang tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
210a1(mdo sde): yul bzang por skyes so/ / lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du
210a2(mdo sde): skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des
210a3(mdo sde): mthong ngo / / de nas sngon bram zor gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon/
210a4(mdo sde): bar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i spu'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu
210a5(mdo sde): tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang /
210a6(mdo sde): pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan
210a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud
210b1(mdo sde): / nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes
210b2(mdo sde): rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i cho ga lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i
210b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di
210b4(mdo sde): lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon mtshun rnams
210b5(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod
210b6(mdo sde): nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ / mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug
210b7(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar
211a1(mdo sde): @#dka' ba yi/ / thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'byung ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba
211a2(mdo sde): byas nas kyang / / lha yi 'jig rten la ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa le spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal
211a3(mdo sde): ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srong dang tho rangs
211a4(mdo sde): mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
211a5(mdo sde): zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du
211a6(mdo sde): mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi pa la blta
211a7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ bram ze'i bu gcig pa de tshe thung ste shi nas/ de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i
211b1(mdo sde): / thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i skabs su bram ze des bu gcig pa sdug cing 'phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du/
211b2(mdo sde): 'ong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / mi mthun pa med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas pang bar bzhag ste/ kyi hud bu/ kyi hud bu thu bo/ kyi hud bu gcig pa zhes zer zhing 'bod de/ de'i
211b3(mdo sde): nye du rnams kyis de ltar gtsug kyang bslang ma nus nas/ de khwa dang / chun lag dang / bya rgod dang / wa rnams kyis ni bskor/ bud med skra bshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs/ skye bo mang pos
211b4(mdo sde): ni blta zhing 'dug go/ / de nas de'i bu lhar skyes pas/ pa smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas/ snying rjes snying bskyed de/ pha'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lugs su sprul nas/
211b5(mdo sde): dur khrod kyi 'dab tu dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug go// de nas bram ze des/ drang srong de la dris pa/ kye drang srong chen po khyod dka' thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ drang srong gis smras pa/ nga ni rgyal srid
211b6(mdo sde): sgrub ste/ nga'i gsar gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni mdun nas 'dren te/ shing rta de la nga zhon
211b7(mdo sde): zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do/ / bram zes spras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar// rgyun du dka' thub spyad byas te// dka' thub mchog gis spyad byas kyang // gnas de khyod kyis re
212a1(mdo sde): mi 'thob/ / drang srong gis smras pa/ khyod kyang shi ba'i khog pa mchog tu mnam zhing mi gtsang ba'i ro shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ bram zes smras pa/ sdug
212a2(mdo sde): pa'i bu gcig pa shi ste de sgrub bo/ / drang srong gis smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar// rgyun du ngu ba'i las byas kyang // bu de khyod kyis re mi thob// khyod ni dus kyang ci la phan// de nas
212a3(mdo sde): bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden no snyam nas dad pa skyes so/ / dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces byas so// de nas drang srong gi cha lugs de mi snang bar byas nas/ rang gi cha lugs su 'dug ste pa la
212a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ bdag ni khyod kyi bu gcig pa de yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir
212a5(mdo sde): 'dir 'ongs so/ / yab khyod tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhud cig dang / khyod kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar 'gyur yang srid do// de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus bu bor nas
212a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de
212a7(mdo sde): la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun
212b1(mdo sde): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ / des mtho bar gyur pa thob cing rnyed pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo // de nas
212b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pha'i mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang
212b3(mdo sde): bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas/ pha yongs su bskyabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus
212b4(mdo sde): na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe'ang pha gsad pa las thug pa las lan gsum ba skyabs byas te/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das
212b5(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA NA si na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu 'drang ba zhig go// de nas re zhig na de'i
212b6(mdo sde): phas rkun po byas nas rgyal pos gshed ma rnams la gsod cig ces bsgo'o/ / de nas dus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas/ srog 'phangs pa byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
212b7(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no// byi ba byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no// dge slong rnams
213a1(mdo sde): kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na nges pa dang bu gnyis ka bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag par rdzos
213a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la gnyis ka dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas ni phyir da ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bas na 'du byed
213a3(mdo sde): thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par ba ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
213a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi
213a5(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // sA la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang /
213a6(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
213a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
213b1(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nam sa chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang //
213b2(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
213b3(mdo sde): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sA la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas//
213b4(mdo sde): shing sA la'i me tog blangs te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sA la'i me tog blangs te mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang / bcom
213b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/ bu mo des
213b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma
213b7(mdo sde): stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lnga bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dka' ba skyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la sA la'i me tog gis gtor to// de
214a1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor bar byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam pa dang / re zhig na de sA la'i shing la 'dzegs pa las
214a2(mdo sde): sbyang ste shi nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas pas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// de nas re zhig na lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis bdun te/
214a3(mdo sde): lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo // de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing
214a4(mdo sde): 'dug pa las lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de/
214a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+ma ut+pal lta bur gyur// 'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od byung 'di dag ci las gyur// ci yi phyir khyod kyi
214a6(mdo sde): bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra ga ser mdog lta bur gyur/ / las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la spros// lha mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi//
214a7(mdo sde): mi yi nyi ma nyan thos bcas// sA la'i me tog rdul med pa// bzang po dag gis legs par gtor// las dag de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin mdog
214b1(mdo sde): pad+ma zla ba ltar/ / rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing // nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la
214b2(mdo sde): khyod kyis sa bon btab/ / bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma// bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab
214b3(mdo sde): yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ / gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye
214b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan
214b5(mdo sde): 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / / de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin
214b6(mdo sde): gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor
214b7(mdo sde): bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid/
215a1(mdo sde): kyi mtshan mo sA la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te// chos
215a2(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/
215a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du
215a4(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /
215a5(mdo sde): rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma
215a6(mdo sde): bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis
215a7(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ / yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan
215b1(mdo sde): mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ / mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mchos
215b2(mdo sde): rol rgal/ / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub
215b3(mdo sde): pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ / de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten la
215b4(mdo sde): ltas lha yul song / / de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor
215b5(mdo sde): pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / / dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom
215b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag
215b7(mdo sde): po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mjed kyi bdag
216a1(mdo sde): po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// bu mo gang gis la mkhar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod tu
216a2(mdo sde): mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// de ni nga la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan
216a3(mdo sde): nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o//
216a4(mdo sde): ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
216a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bcu gsum pa/
216a6(mdo sde): dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
216a7(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
216b1(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
216b2(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
216b3(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na
