216b4(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang /
216b5(mdo sde): 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing
216b6(mdo sde): tsher ma dkrugs la/ ru gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang
216b7(mdo sde): bcas te dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la/ ngang pa dang /
217a1(mdo sde): khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang /
217a2(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dong nas/ der btsun mo'i 'khor gyis/ rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag ni gdugs gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo mi thogs na/
217a3(mdo sde): lha btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar ci gnang / 'on tang bdag cag gis de la rgyun du mar me dang / bdug pa
217a4(mdo sde): dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis ba kur sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas re zhig na rgyal po
217a5(mdo sde): gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu skra dang sen mo stsal du gsol/ 'on tang bdag gis mchis brang 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
217a6(mdo sde): mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ / de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas
217a7(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsros nas de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang / bdug pa
217b1(mdo sde): dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lha sbyin
217b2(mdo sde): gyis rbad de/ yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad de/ su'ang/
217b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur sti ma byed cig ces khrims kyang bcas so// de nas gang gi tshe tshes bco lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i dus la bab po de'i tshe/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i
217b4(mdo sde): mchod rten de la su phyag bdar byed pa 'am/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog 'bul ba med do// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa'ang
217b5(mdo sde): mthong / rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang dran nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams las 'gribs so zhes 'dzer to// de'i nang
217b6(mdo sde): nas btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsngos te sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag bdar byas te mar me'i 'phreng ba dngar
217b7(mdo sde): to/ / de nas re zhig na rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du byung ste/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang / re zhig na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra
218a1(mdo sde): dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i 'phreng ba dang ra ba lags so zhes byas so/ / de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces rmas na//
218a2(mdo sde): de na re bdag gis khyod kyi bka' bcag tu lags kyang / bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bka' ma bcag go zhes zer ro// de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'phang
218a3(mdo sde): te bsad do/ / de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// de'i tshe lha'i mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas/ lha'i bu mo dpal
218a4(mdo sde): ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig pa dang ldan pa de lha'i mdun ma'i nang du song ngo / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang lha'i 'od dpag
218a5(mdo sde): tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+ma ut+pal lta bur gyur// 'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur//
218a6(mdo sde): ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur// las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smos// lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum
218a7(mdo sde): mgon 'gro ba'i sgron gcig pu/ / mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas mthong // sgra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba la// mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon du phul// zla ba'i 'od zer
218b1(mdo sde): mchog dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ / mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa bskyed// 'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis// ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang bgyis// las dge de 'dra byas
218b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ / bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar// rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing // nyes pa thams
218b3(mdo sde): cad rnam spangs pa/ / mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma// bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang
218b4(mdo sde): la bkur sti byas pa ni/ / sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur mdang sa da kar de la su mi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas
218b5(mdo sde): ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu
218b6(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag
218b7(mdo sde): lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal
219a1(mdo sde): ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba des de nyid kyi mtshan mo me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/
219a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i kha ba bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar 'dug go//
219a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta
219a4(mdo sde): bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa
219a5(mdo sde): mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ba skams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad
219a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis//
219a7(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so//
219b1(mdo sde): yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gi thob//
219b2(mdo sde): bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog
219b3(mdo sde): dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ / skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba
219b4(mdo sde): dga' gyur te/ / btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mtsho
219b5(mdo sde): pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
219b6(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / / dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung
219b7(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang
220a1(mdo sde): brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi/
220a2(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas
220a3(mdo sde): rang gi srog dang bsngos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i 'phreng ba dang ra nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas
220a4(mdo sde): bsad de/ de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste/ sus cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar
220a5(mdo sde): gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la bkur sti byas/
220a6(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi
220a7(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // go sa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang /
220b1(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha
220b2(mdo sde): lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
220b3(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
220b4(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / spun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
220b5(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul te/ mthar
220b6(mdo sde): gyis gser bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tshe/ de'i blo skyes po/ ma la bdag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod
220b7(mdo sde): kyis/ bdag gis skye bo dbul po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa sdud de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen
221a1(mdo sde): bkur bya'o/ / de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skye bo mang po la'ang phan btags par 'gyur la/ bsod nams mang po'ang skyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas khyim
221a2(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de rgyal po la gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi
221a3(mdo sde): mi khyed rnams nyon cig/ deng nas zhag bdun na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir glang po che la zhon te dad pa sdud par 'dod kyis/ khyed gang
221a4(mdo sde): gis ji tsam yongs su gtang bar bya ba de yongs su gtang bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ / de nas re zhig na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim pa dag mgon med zas sprin glang po che la zhon te/ de
221a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa sdud pa la zhugs te/ der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed do// kha cig ni mgul gyi do shal sbyin par byed/
221a6(mdo sde): cig ni gdu bu sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser gyi 'phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni sor gdub kyi rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin
221a7(mdo sde): par byed/ kha cig ni gser sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni tha na zho'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par byed do// khyim bdag de'ang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir len
221b1(mdo sde): par byed do/ / de nas re zhig na bud med shin tu dbul mo zhig gis sha thang ste/ zla ba gsum gyis ras yug cig rnyed nas/ des ras de gyon te/ srang du zhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag
221b2(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin dung 'bud cing rnga zlum rdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ongs pa mthong nas/ des dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ ci ste khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/ gter
221b3(mdo sde): sa'i 'og tu sbas pa rnams kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing skor bar byed ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen de na re/ gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir te/ gang dag
221b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag gi don du phan 'dogs par byed de/ ci nas mang por bsdongs te bcom ldan 'das la dbul du gzhug
221b5(mdo sde): go zhes zer ro/ / de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa/ 'o na bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin/ bdag gcig pus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba'i mthu
221b6(mdo sde): bdag la med kyis/ bdag gis 'di la cung zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug gcig ma gtogs pa gzhan ci'ang ma mthong ste
221b7(mdo sde): des bsams pa/ gal te bdag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag gcer bur 'byung gi/ bdag khang thog tu song la ras dor ro snyam mo// de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang
222a1(mdo sde): gi lus las ras phud de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis khang thog nas bor ba las na 'di la nor
222a2(mdo sde): las med gor ma chag snyam nas/ rang gi g.yog rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed ras 'di sus bor ltos shis ces byas nas/ de dag gis bltas pa dang / re zhig na bu mo de tsog tsog pur 'dug pa
222a3(mdo sde): mthong / / de nas de dag gis dris pa/ de na re bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/ bdag gis gos rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
222a4(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro/ / de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin la byas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bu mo de
222a5(mdo sde): la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to/ / de nas de tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gzhan su la'ang med pa de lta
222a6(mdo sde): bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo / / lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam
222a7(mdo sde): mo/ / de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu
222b1(mdo sde): mo rnam gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smrig
222b2(mdo sde): ka la sogs pa sa byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar
222b3(mdo sde): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsam
222b4(mdo sde): pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtog smra bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i
222b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/
222b6(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba sbyang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba
222b7(mdo sde): dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen
223a1(mdo sde): gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan
223a2(mdo sde): pa'i ngan song las/ / shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i
223a3(mdo sde): mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye//
223a4(mdo sde): dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub khyod ni dang mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag
223a5(mdo sde): 'tshal nas/ / dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten la ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru
223a6(mdo sde): rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas
223a7(mdo sde): su song ngo / / dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/
223b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan
223b2(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba
223b3(mdo sde): bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin te/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
223b4(mdo sde): bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
223b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti bya'o// bkur sti med par mi bya'o// dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
223b6(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // ne tso zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang /
223b7(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang //
224a1(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa
224a2(mdo sde): byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
224a3(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
224a4(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying
224a5(mdo sde): po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang
224a6(mdo sde): 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma krugs la/
224a7(mdo sde): bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid basbyangs so// rgyal po de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba dang / bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs te/
224b1(mdo sde): rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa che ba/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go// de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa la oM tshugs bcas nas/ sems
224b2(mdo sde): khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ / de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo // ngas bde bar gshes
224b3(mdo sde): pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo / / nga ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal
224b4(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to/ / de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa
224b5(mdo sde): ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/
224b6(mdo sde): gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas
224b7(mdo sde): pa/ nu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis
225a1(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan
225a2(mdo sde): lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag
225a3(mdo sde): brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu
225a4(mdo sde): pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni/
225a5(mdo sde): dang / su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni 'phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan
225a6(mdo sde): song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya// su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang
225a7(mdo sde): bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las bskyed par bya/ sur+thi
225b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ 'dir smras pa/ rgya
225b2(mdo sde): mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ / dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan
225b3(mdo sde): 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas/ chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams
225b4(mdo sde): nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las/ nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig gnas te/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig
225b5(mdo sde): nas mthong ngo / / de nas shin tu rings par song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so// /
225b6(mdo sde): bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing
225b7(mdo sde): gang la ne tse gnas pa de'i drung du rtsa'i gdan bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ / nyan thos chen po rnams ni shing gzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do// de nas ne tsos bcom ldan
226a1(mdo sde): 'das dang nyan thos rnams la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ gcan gzan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan
226a2(mdo sde): thog thag nags khrod de na phan tshun skor bar byed do/ / de nas nam nangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dung
226a3(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pas/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci'ang ma mchis na bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/ rgyal po
226a4(mdo sde): gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes sbran par 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas re zhig na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du
226a5(mdo sde): chas te/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i thad du phyin to// de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni khang bzangs kyi steng na bud med 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//
226a6(mdo sde): de nas ne tso mi skad shes pa des/ rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po khyod mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyis/
226a7(mdo sde): lha khyod kyis bshos sta gon mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas so// de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang bzang gi steng nas babs nas blon po chen po'i tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ bcom ldan
226b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi gdan rnams ba shams nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba da na rnams dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsu'o// de nas bcom
226b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so/ / de nas ne tso de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom
226b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gi yon tan yin no snyam du rig nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
226b4(mdo sde): nas/ rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun du lding ba las khras khyer te bsad do// bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed de shi ba sa ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// /
226b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas dud
226b6(mdo sde): 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di
226b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo//
227a1(mdo sde): @#de nas sngon ne cor gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shAl dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod
227a2(mdo sde): pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da/
227a3(mdo sde): rab rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi
227a4(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
227a5(mdo sde): rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
227a6(mdo sde): bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral
227a7(mdo sde): ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhug pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang
227b1(mdo sde): ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang
227b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis
227b3(mdo sde): thob/ / bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol ba rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/
227b4(mdo sde): mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal
227b5(mdo sde): 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ btud cing zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten la bltas lha yul song // de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i
227b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan
227b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / / dge slong dag ni srong dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
228a1(mdo sde): kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum
228a2(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
228a3(mdo sde): pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// ne tso gang gis nga nags khrod der
228a4(mdo sde): nub mo'i dgongs mal la spyan drangs pa de khyed kyis de mthong ngam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
228a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag ne tso de nyid shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bcu
228a6(mdo sde): nan des ne cor skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sngon ne cor gyur pa'i lha'i bus
228a7(mdo sde): tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon no cor gyur ba'i lha'i bus las byas shing
228b1(mdo sde): bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
228b2(mdo sde): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye
228b3(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ / lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin
228b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
228b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
228b6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re zhig ni de na dge bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas
228b7(mdo sde): te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ni cor skyes so// ngal sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so// des bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur
229a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba
229a2(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par
229a3(mdo sde): gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom
229a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / kho nya zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
229a5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang //
229a6(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/
229a7(mdo sde): mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
229b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/
229b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas par dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po
229b3(mdo sde): gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog cig/ ces bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag
229b4(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong / bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so//
229b5(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis
229b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ b+ha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam pa zhes so zhes thos lags so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / khyim bdag mgon
229b7(mdo sde): med zas sbyin la sogs pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi dang / blon po rnams kyis mi zhig pho nyas bkug ste/ kye mi khyod tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la
230a1(mdo sde): der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal/ bdag cag gi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/
230a2(mdo sde): babaskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad du btsun pa kos
230a3(mdo sde): la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring po zhig tu ma mthong
230a4(mdo sde): bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du
230a5(mdo sde): yod par gshegs su gsol zhes ma ri'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo'o/ / de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams
230a6(mdo sde): kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ rgyal po'i khab tu song nas/ mthar gyis song song ba las/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas
230a7(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mkhyen par
230b1(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
230b2(mdo sde): 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam
230b3(mdo sde): zhes mchi'o/ / 'di skad du bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig tu mthong ste/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan
230b4(mdo sde): 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye gal te
230b5(mdo sde): nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar bya'o/ / de nas pho nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
230b6(mdo sde): 'das gshegs par rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dad pa srul lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom
230b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas/ chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed
231a1(mdo sde): bsnams nas/ sam ring 'khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod pa logs su chas te gshegs so// pho nya'ang shing rta la zhon te chas so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom
231a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas/ shing rta las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to//
231a3(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang // yang dag rtsol lang gnas
231a4(mdo sde): nas/ nyon mongs tsher mas ma snad par// sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed// pho nyas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang bdag la phan gdags
231a5(mdo sde): pa dang / thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcibs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das pho nya la phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shi
231a6(mdo sde): rta la bcibs bzhin du mnyan du yod par byon nas/ pho nyas kyang rgyal po la sbran to// de nas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
231a7(mdo sde): ba su nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod do/ / pho nya de ni tshe thung ste/ chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/ de shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum
231b1(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ / lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang /
231b2(mdo sde): gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa nges mthong ngo // de nas sngon
231b3(mdo sde): pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la
231b4(mdo sde): blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ / de nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis
231b5(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar
231b6(mdo sde): pobopodang / ma n+dar ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
231b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i
232a1(mdo sde): bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo
232a2(mdo sde): rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya
232a3(mdo sde): mcho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di
232a4(mdo sde): lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon rgya
232a5(mdo sde): mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu
232a6(mdo sde): yis bcad/ / bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas
232a7(mdo sde): thob/ / bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nang spangs pa/ sring
232b1(mdo sde): pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ / thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ dgra thub la ni bskor
232b2(mdo sde): ba byas nas kyang / / lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las
232b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po
232b4(mdo sde): gsal rgyal khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas nam nangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi
232b5(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po
232b6(mdo sde): chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ khyod kyi pho nya nga la sems dga' bar gyur nas/ shi
232b7(mdo sde): ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de ma dang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas
233a1(mdo sde): rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun 'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig byas kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so//
233a2(mdo sde): de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
233a3(mdo sde): stan las langs te song ngo // der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs
233a4(mdo sde): rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang / chos mchog tu gdags pa dang / dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o// sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams sam/
233a5(mdo sde): rkang gnyis rnams sam/ rkang bzhi rnams sam/ rkang mangs rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du
233a6(mdo sde): shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/ 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
233a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to/ / sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba
233b1(mdo sde): de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni
233b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ / chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod
233b3(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to/ / chos la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag
233b4(mdo sde): gi ni rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni chos mchog tu
233b5(mdo sde): gdags pa zhes bya'o/ / dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ tshogs sam/ 'dus pa 'am/ mang po 'am/ 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa
233b6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchog yin par bstan te/ dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par
233b7(mdo sde): dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ 'di
234a1(mdo sde): ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
234a2(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do/ / / bam po bcu bzhi pa// ma he zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po
234a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lA ma yin rnam
234a4(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
234a5(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang /
234a6(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las// nags
234a7(mdo sde): khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ma he khyu chen po dang / ma he'i rdzi lnga brgya 'khod do// de nas re zhig na de'i nang na ma he stobs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de
234b1(mdo sde): mi gzhan dag gi dri tshor na phyi bzhin rgyug par byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so// de nas ma he'i rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
234b2(mdo sde): thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / / de nas de dag gis skad chen por bos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis shul 'dir mi gshegs su gsol zhes byas so//
234b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kyengs 'dir dus la bab par shes kyis khyed snying ma chung zhig/ de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ba dang / rnga ma
234b4(mdo sde): ldang du gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der brgyugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun logs su seng ge ral pa can pa g.yengs pa lnga sprul de glo g.yas g.yon du me chen po lnga
234b5(mdo sde): sprul to/ / steng du ni lcags kyi pha bong chen po zhig sprul to// de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
234b6(mdo sde): zhabs la lces bldags nas/ zhum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de la des brda phrad pa'i skad du bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad
234b7(mdo sde): mi rtag pa'o/ / chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bstan nas/ tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de de thos nas ngus so// de nas bcom/
235a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la// da ni nga yis ci byar yod// mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis// don med dus
235a2(mdo sde): pas ci la phan/ / 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can// nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'o skye gnas spangs na legs// 'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas ma he ma rungs pa des
235a3(mdo sde): rang gi lus la smad de/ kha 'chos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags rnams ni me'i drod che bas de skyen par shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so//
235a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo//
235a5(mdo sde): de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ma
235a6(mdo sde): her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan
235a7(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ / de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnam gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che
235b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang /
235b2(mdo sde): ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor
235b3(mdo sde): te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang
235b4(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo
235b5(mdo sde): mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
235b6(mdo sde): kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag
235b7(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen /
236a1(mdo sde): gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/
236a2(mdo sde): nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ros 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/
236a3(mdo sde): bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang
236a4(mdo sde): thob/ / mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nang spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas
236a5(mdo sde): do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song // de nas sngon ma
236a6(mdo sde): her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang
236a7(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / / de nas ma ho rje de dag gis snang ba chen po mthong ngo // de mthong nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs
236b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdang sum bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ lha'i 'od kyis snang bar bgyid pa de su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
236b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ khyed kyi ma he de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/
236b3(mdo sde): bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis mchog tu ya mtshun du gyur te ngo mtshar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa 'di'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen
236b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis ci ste khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo// de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
236b5(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs
236b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
236b7(mdo sde): sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ma her skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ ma he rdzi 'di rnams kyis
237a1(mdo sde): ni las ci bgyis na des ma he rdzir gyur lags/ las gang bgyis na rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
237a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na//
237a3(mdo sde): de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin
237a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
237a5(mdo sde): khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu
237a6(mdo sde): nyid du smin par 'gyur/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
237a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
237b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sin drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs par
237b2(mdo sde): byed pa na/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang gtan la 'bebs pa'i nang na 'dug go// de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag kyang yod de/ de sde snod gsum pa la 'dri
237b3(mdo sde): bar byed la/ des ni lan ma thebs pa dang / de khros nas ngag gi las rtsub po phyung ste/ nags kyi ma he dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes byas so// de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang ma he rdzi dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci
237b4(mdo sde): shes zhes smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de nyid ma he 'di yin no// slob ma de dag ni ma he rdzi 'di dag
237b5(mdo sde): yin te/ las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar ma her skyes so// slob ma rnams kyang ma he rdzi lnga brgyar gyur to// nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa des ni lhar skyes so// dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ tshul khrims
237b6(mdo sde): bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de bas na ngag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ ci nas ma he dang ma he rdzi rnams kyi nyes pa de lta
237b7(mdo sde): bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge
238a1(mdo sde): slong de dag spyi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma
238a2(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / rong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
238a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / b+ha ma yin rnams dang / na ma mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas
238a4(mdo sde): te/ lho dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
238a5(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ / na bza' dang // zhal zas dang / gzims ma dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/
238a6(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de chos nyan
238a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ / de nas phyis re zhig na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
238b1(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang /
238b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu
238b3(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya
238b4(mdo sde): mtsho bskam pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams bye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la
238b5(mdo sde): paphas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma
238b6(mdo sde): bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams
238b7(mdo sde): rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ / mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug/
239a1(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//
239a2(mdo sde): srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni
239a3(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas kyang / / lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las
239a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i tshe dge slong dag srong
239a5(mdo sde): dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
239a6(mdo sde): 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma dang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad
239a7(mdo sde): du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i
239b1(mdo sde): phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song
239b2(mdo sde): ngo / / de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha'i bu bsnyen gnas ga las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags
239b3(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs
239b4(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcob
239b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs la/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
239b6(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sin drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// phyis re zhig na rgyal po kri kri bcom ldan
239b7(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo // de nas re zhig na bram ze gnyis drang srong smra ba'i don zhig la song ba dang / de gnyis kyis rgyal po de/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /
240a1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i mthu stobs chen po dang ldan pa mthong ngo // de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes/ de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ kye sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen las ci
240a2(mdo sde): zhig byas na/ de las ci bsags pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so// dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag par bsru
240a3(mdo sde): pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang / ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so// de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag chu stod las bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrungs
240a4(mdo sde): so/ / de na gcig gis ni yongs su dag par bsrungs te/ de nas shi nas rgyal po kri kri'i bur skyes te/ de'i ming legs skyes zhes btags nas pa shi ba'i 'og tu de rgyal por bcug go// cig shos kyis ni
240a5(mdo sde): bsnyen gnas nyams par byas te/ de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te/ de'i steng du nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye tshan bab ste/ des rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed do// de nas de 'di snyam du
240a6(mdo sde): sems te/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu yin/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa yin na/ des bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam mo// de nas des bsnyen gnas
240a7(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag gis blangs pa las/ bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyams su myong la/ gang gis blangs te bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid
240b1(mdo sde): thob par gyur to snyam mo/ / yang de 'di snyam sems te/ da yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan par bsrung bar bya'o// 'on tang bdag klu'i skye gnas las thar par 'gyur
240b2(mdo sde): yang srid do snyam mo/ / de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i thad du 'ongs te phyin nas rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog cig ces bstod nas smras pa
240b3(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyis/ lha bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa btsal du gsol/ gal te ma btsal na gdon mi 'tshal bar lho'i
240b4(mdo sde): dbu tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag ste mi dga' la skyi bung zhes byas nas/ gser 'bum yod pa'i snod
240b5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bdag gis yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas/ su nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa ston pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin no// bkur sti chen
240b6(mdo sde): bos kyang bkur bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ / de nas re zhig na shing mkhan gyi bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/ sngon bdag gi pa rtag tu ka ba 'di la spos dang /
240b7(mdo sde): bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod pa bgyid na 'di phyung ste gzigs shig ces byas so// de nas rgyal pos zham ring ba rnams la ka ba 'di phyung zhig ces bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po'i zham ring rnams
241a1(mdo sde): kyis ka ba de phyung ba dang / de'i 'og nas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum
241a2(mdo sde): cu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs bam zhig la bris pa zhig rnyed do/ / de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bris te byin no// drang srong smra ba gnas pa'i drang srong khri nyis stong
241a3(mdo sde): gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas so/ / klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thang la byung ste/ lus bor nas de la
241a4(mdo sde): 'tshos te 'dug go/ de nas shi ste g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// dge slong dag bsnyen gnas ni de nas byung ste/ ming yang de las btags
241a5(mdo sde): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / ngang pa zhes bya ba ni/
241a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha
241a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar bas/
241b1(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
241b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
241b3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po
241b4(mdo sde): gsal rgyal rgyal po byed do/ / de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang
241b5(mdo sde): nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs
241b6(mdo sde): la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// phyir re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal du
241b7(mdo sde): song ba dang / ba la'i rgyal pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skyes su bskur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe/ ngang pa lnga brgya po de dag phul lo//
242a1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dang pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du btang nas/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i
242a2(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro la/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyos ma
242a3(mdo sde): byin te/ de dag gis zos nas tshim zhing dbang po rtas te 'khod do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe//
242a4(mdo sde): ngang ba de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste chos nyan par byed do// de nas de dag tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas
242a5(mdo sde): ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyi sde sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ ganga' nas shi 'phos/ gang du byes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas dang pa las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu
242a6(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnam 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
242a7(mdo sde): cag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon
242b1(mdo sde): ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang /
242b2(mdo sde): tam la'i lo ma dang / sdig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/
242b3(mdo sde): rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom
242b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de/
242b5(mdo sde): lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
242b6(mdo sde): thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la
242b7(mdo sde): bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag cag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/
243a1(mdo sde): mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis
243a2(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyis mthu yis bcad//
243a3(mdo sde): bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob// bdag cag de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob/
243a4(mdo sde): bdag cag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//
243a5(mdo sde): srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang rnams dgar gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ dgra thub
243a6(mdo sde): la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / / lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /
243a7(mdo sde): dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / mang pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lpags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de'i tshe
243b1(mdo sde): dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs
243b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la
243b3(mdo sde): blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi
243b4(mdo sde): la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no/ / dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa lnga brgya 'dir btang ba khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/
243b5(mdo sde): de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de dag ma dang sum nga'i thad du lhags nas de dag la ngas chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur/
243b6(mdo sde): nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon drang bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las
243b7(mdo sde): gang dag bgyis na/ des ngang par skyes pa lags/ las gang dag bgyis na/ des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di
244a1(mdo sde): dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/
244a2(mdo sde): sngon dang bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsag pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
244a3(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i
244a4(mdo sde): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//
244a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
244a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
244a7(mdo sde): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sin drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung
244b1(mdo sde): ba las bslab pa la lhod par byas pa des na ngang par skyes so/ / ngal sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so// bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to// /
244b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang
244b3(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma
244b4(mdo sde): rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
244b5(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshogs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs so// /
244b6(mdo sde): / sdom ni/ gser 'od dang ni dri zhim dang // byad bzangs stobs ldan sdug gu dang // pad+ma mig dang rnga sgra dang / khu dang nyi ma gyad pa dang / gser 'od ces bya ba ni
244b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
245a1(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
245a2(mdo sde): bkur sti byas/ tha mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
245a3(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
245a4(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang
245a5(mdo sde): la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
