245a6(mdo sde): blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/
245a7(mdo sde): khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig btsas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis gra
245b1(mdo sde): khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas so/ / de nas pa ma dang / sems can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te/ sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs shig/
245b2(mdo sde): gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhugs so// de na de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di
245b3(mdo sde): btsas pa na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gser 'od ces gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u gser 'od
245b4(mdo sde): pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ru ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /
245b5(mdo sde): zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang mkhas
245b6(mdo sde): shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig go/ phyis re
245b7(mdo sde): zhig na de byang gzugs kyis rgyags pas myos te/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na rtse zhing 'dug go/ shAkya mang po dag cig kyang shing n+ya kro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo // de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis
246a1(mdo sde): mthong nas dris pa/ khyed gar 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o// de nas khye'u
246a2(mdo sde): gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba thos te/ sngon ma thos pa'i ming thos nas spu thams cad zing zhes byas te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag kyang
246a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chag snyam nas/ de'ang shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
246a4(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba
246a5(mdo sde): rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i
246a6(mdo sde): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ de chos thos pa dang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to// de nas re zhig na pha ma la gsol
246a7(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
246b1(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang
246b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/ khye'u gser 'od la 'di
246b3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gzhon nu tshu ro shog/ tshangs par spyod cig/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod la/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam
246b4(mdo sde): ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/
246b5(mdo sde): de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon// sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas// mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan
246b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam
246b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
247a1(mdo sde): byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa
247a2(mdo sde): tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa
247a3(mdo sde): dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams
247a4(mdo sde): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung nas dgra bcom
247a5(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gser 'od nyid kyis sngon tshe rab sa gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal
247a6(mdo sde): bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/
247a7(mdo sde): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smon par mi 'gyur te/
247b1(mdo sde): las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnam
247b2(mdo sde): ni/ / bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa dgu
247b3(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
247b4(mdo sde): gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na brten
247b5(mdo sde): cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med
247b6(mdo sde): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i
247b7(mdo sde): mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do// de nas re zhig ni khyim bdag cig mchod
248a1(mdo sde): rten gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las/ mchod rten de las gser gyi me long zhig lhung ba des mthong nas des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas mchod rten de la btags te//
248a2(mdo sde): spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par
248a3(mdo sde): byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin/
248a4(mdo sde): pa de ni khye'u gser 'od 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur byad gzugs khyad par can du gyur to// smon
248a5(mdo sde): lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ / dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag
248a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge
248a7(mdo sde): slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag
248b1(mdo sde): khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
248b2(mdo sde): dri zhim zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon
248b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
248b4(mdo sde): po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
248b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
248b6(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang
248b7(mdo sde): la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs
249a1(mdo sde): nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang
249a2(mdo sde): bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ de'i kha nas me tog ut+pa la'i dri byung la/ lus thams
249a3(mdo sde): cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri byung ngo / / de nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re 'di'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri byung
249a4(mdo sde): la/ lus thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri byung bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u dri zhim pa na 'tshe ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i
249a5(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying
249a6(mdo sde): khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang sngon gyi rgyu stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/
249a7(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim dpung rgyan dang / mgul pa'i do shal
249b1(mdo sde): dang / gdu gus brgyan te/ srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan gyi dri bsung gis grong khyer thams cad khyad par gyur te/ skye bo mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tshor nas/ mchog tu ya
249b2(mdo sde): mtshan du 'dzin te/ 'di skad du kye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes 'dzer to// phyis re zhig na khye'u dri zhim shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan
249b3(mdo sde): 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag
249b4(mdo sde): ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan
249b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi zha ba sa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spun sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams
249b6(mdo sde): dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye
249b7(mdo sde): shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // nges brtson pa dang /
250a1(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil pa dang / ltung ba dang /
250a2(mdo sde): rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos cad yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod
250a3(mdo sde): chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
250a4(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
250a5(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dri zhim gyis
250a6(mdo sde): las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di lta bu'i kha nas ni ut+pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
250a7(mdo sde): dri zhim nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi zad pa rangapa' las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dri zhim
250b1(mdo sde): nyid kyi sa las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi
250b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ nu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa de rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams
250b3(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin
250b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
250b5(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
250b6(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
250b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas
251a1(mdo sde): rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dang
251a2(mdo sde): tsacad gcig yod la/ 'bang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do// khyim bdag gcig gis kyang de la dad pa skyes nas/ spos
251a3(mdo sde): dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/ bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba
251a4(mdo sde): 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan
251a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
251a6(mdo sde): rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur dri zhim par gyur to/ / smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag
251a7(mdo sde): de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// las
251b1(mdo sde): nagacig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams
251b2(mdo sde): spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
251b3(mdo sde): de dag yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bco lnga pa// byad bzangs zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
251b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams
251b5(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar
251b6(mdo sde): byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
251b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'o dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
252a1(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs
252a2(mdo sde): spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de
252a3(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang
252a4(mdo sde): zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa// lus byung dpe med la mdog 'jam pa/ lus kyi bdun mtho ba/ che bar grags pa zhig btsas so// de nas de
252a5(mdo sde): btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di'i lus dpe med pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byad bzangs zhes gdags
252a6(mdo sde): so zhes zer ro/ / de nas khye'u byang bzangs pa ngan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i sa ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ sa ma brgyad la gtad nas/
252a7(mdo sde): de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par
252b1(mdo sde): mgyur to/ / de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang tha na
252b2(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag kyang gtsang mar gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams dang ldan zhing che bar
252b3(mdo sde): grags so/ / phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang
252b4(mdo sde): po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu nges
252b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ / dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas
252b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos
252b7(mdo sde): nas khye'u byang bzangs kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la
253a1(mdo sde): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas pol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing ma
253a2(mdo sde): brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsa chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/
253a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems
253a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /
253a5(mdo sde): chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom
253a6(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa byad bzangs kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di lta bu'i lus 'di lta bur gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur la/ bcom
253a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byad bzangs nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i
253b1(mdo sde): las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ byad bzangs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnam
253b2(mdo sde): ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags
253b3(mdo sde): pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing
253b4(mdo sde): dus la bab na/ / 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
253b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
253b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
253b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod
254a1(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags
254a2(mdo sde): gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der rgyal po gnyen yod gnyen gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring ring byas pas/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byas so// phyis re zhig na nyi ma
254a3(mdo sde): cig gcig mi dbul po zhig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song nas der me tog rnying pa dag dang / mchod rten rdul gyis yog pa dag mthong ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas
254a4(mdo sde): dad pa skyes te/ phyags ma blangs nas mchod rten yang phyags/ me tog rnying pa'ang bsal to// de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa mthong nas dga' ba skyes te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal
254a5(mdo sde): nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi
254a6(mdo sde): mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni byang bzangs
254a7(mdo sde): 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la phyag bdar byas pas na/ byang gzugs bzang por gyur to// smon lam btab pa des tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de
254b1(mdo sde): ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges
254b2(mdo sde): par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs
254b3(mdo sde): la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag
254b4(mdo sde): yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// stobs ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po
254b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
254b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
254b7(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang
255a1(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / spun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha
255a2(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa
255a3(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa
255a4(mdo sde): las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags pa zhig btsas so// de
255a5(mdo sde): nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming
255a6(mdo sde): stobs ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ / de nas khye'u stobs ldan phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/
255a7(mdo sde): ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i
255b1(mdo sde): nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ / de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa
255b2(mdo sde): zhig go/ de nas phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad
255b3(mdo sde): bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu/
255b4(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas
255b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos
255b6(mdo sde): nas khye'u stobs ldan gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la
255b7(mdo sde): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi
256a1(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsang chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/
256a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i
256a3(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang
256a4(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas
256a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa stobs ldan gyis las gang bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan par
256a6(mdo sde): gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag stobs ldan nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang
256a7(mdo sde): ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su
256b1(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur te/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin
256b2(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/
256b3(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das
256b4(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
256b5(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i
256b6(mdo sde): pho brang gnyen ldan na brten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du
256b7(mdo sde): phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas
257a1(mdo sde): nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus
257a2(mdo sde): ston byed pa der skye bo phal po ches klu blangs/ gar byas pas mchod rten rdul gyis yog par gyur to// phyis re zhig na khyim bdag cig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song ba dang / des mchod rten
257a3(mdo sde): 'khor sa rdul gyis yog pa mthong ngo / / de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ spos kyi lde gu til mar dang sbyar ba phul te smon lam btab pa/ bdag
257a4(mdo sde): gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
257a5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs ldan 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la
257a6(mdo sde): bkur sti byas pa des na/ stobs dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnam
257a7(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma
257b1(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar
257b2(mdo sde): ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das
257b3(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / // sdug gu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang /
257b4(mdo sde): brang 'khor gyi mi rnams nga / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi
257b5(mdo sde): ba ma ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
257b6(mdo sde): ram ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang /
257b7(mdo sde): snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na
258a1(mdo sde): shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa
258a2(mdo sde): des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ rlung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad
258a3(mdo sde): dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa mthong na dga' ba zhig btsas te/ de bcas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad grags pas
258a4(mdo sde): rgyas par gyur to/ / de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi
258a5(mdo sde): snying du sdug pas na/ khye'u 'di'i ming sdug gu zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u sdug gu pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang
258a6(mdo sde): dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gatrad nas/ de ma ma brgyad 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis
258a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa srings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying
258b1(mdo sde): rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze
258b2(mdo sde): dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas sdud por byed do// de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u sdug gu shing n+ya kro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des
258b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma
258b4(mdo sde): stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang
258b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang
258b6(mdo sde): bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u sdug gus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
258b7(mdo sde): bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bslab
259a1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par
259a2(mdo sde): 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsa ba chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chag
259a3(mdo sde): dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bu bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom
259a4(mdo sde): nas/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
259a5(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sdug gu
259a6(mdo sde): las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang / sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
259a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sdug gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas
259b1(mdo sde): shing bsags pas na/ sdug gu nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i
259b2(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa
259b3(mdo sde): rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing
259b4(mdo sde): dus la bab pa na/ / 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
259b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
259b6(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
259b7(mdo sde): rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//
260a1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad
260a2(mdo sde): gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so// de nas phyis re zhig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba na/ khyim bdag gcig gis
260a3(mdo sde): rgyal po la gsol to/ / bdag ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas khyim
260a4(mdo sde): bdag de dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis dril ba sgrags te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me
260a5(mdo sde): tog gdags te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba bskyed nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji
260a6(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdug gu 'di yin te/ des skye bo phal po che dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des ni/ skye bo phal po che'i
260a7(mdo sde): snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gam/
260b1(mdo sde): ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma
260b2(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de bas na la sa gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnam
260b3(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
260b4(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / // pad+ma'i mig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang
260b5(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am
260b6(mdo sde): ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ro mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
260b7(mdo sde): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun
261a1(mdo sde): gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thob kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe
261a2(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yang sa shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des
261a3(mdo sde): rigs mnyam pa la sa chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad
261a4(mdo sde): dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mig pad+mo sngon po 'dra ba/ mgo bo la lha'i nor bu rin po che mthon ka thogs pa zhig btsas te/ des grong khyer
261a5(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas thams cad nor bu mthon ka'i kha dog can du byas so/ / de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na
261a6(mdo sde): re/ khye'u 'di'i mig pad+ma 'dra bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad+ma'i mig ces gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma
261a7(mdo sde): gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i sa ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / thun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang /
261b1(mdo sde): gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed pa srings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa
261b2(mdo sde): dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la
261b3(mdo sde): gnas pa zhig ste/ de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod cing rjed do// de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u pad+ma'i mig shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs
261b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong
261b5(mdo sde): babs lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom
261b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang /
261b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi
262a1(mdo sde): shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong
262a2(mdo sde): dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'bongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nges brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa
262a3(mdo sde): dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam
262a4(mdo sde): par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur
262a5(mdo sde): nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur ba sil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig
262a6(mdo sde): ba dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
262a7(mdo sde): bachod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas re zhig de bsod snyoms la song ba dang / skye bo phal po ches de la bltas nas ngo tsha bar gyur to// de nas pad+ma'i mig bcom ldan
262b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
262b2(mdo sde): bu 'di ni las las skyes de yin pas na med par bya mi nus so// de lta mod kyi/ ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis mi mthong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
262b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/ / de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa pad+ma'i mig gis las gang dag
262b4(mdo sde): bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing
262b5(mdo sde): rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig
262b6(mdo sde): gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi kham
262b7(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//
263a1(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du sbyin par 'gyur// dge slong da
263a2(mdo sde): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gsheg
263a3(mdo sde): ba/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i le lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
263a4(mdo sde): de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na brten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing
263a5(mdo sde): zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhags med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i grwa gdung stsa
263a6(mdo sde): klu gdung gi mchod pa zugs / rin po rim pa'i las byas pa'i mtshon rten lo ma lo cug kyang pa ga rgyad gcig yongs/ 'bad du cang thugs gcig yod bzhin brtsigs / ga
263a7(mdo sde): tshigasa'i bum thag du pas bkur gyi byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re zhig na ded dpom zhig rgya mtsho rin po chu'i don grub ste phyir 'ongs nas/ des de'i nang
263b1(mdo sde): nong bu rin po che mthon ka chen po zhig khyer nas 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ nor bu rin po che de bcom ldan 'das
263b2(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags nas/ de'i mthus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad mthon ka'i kha dog lta bur 'dug par byas so// me tog pad+ma dag gis kyang
263b3(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// /
263b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pad+ma'i mig 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs
263b5(mdo sde): kyi mchod rten la nor bu rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung ngo / / pad+ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni mig pad+ma sngon po lta bur gyur
263b6(mdo sde): to/ / smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag
263b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge
264a1(mdo sde): slong dag de bas na las gcig tungs par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'drenas rnams grangs la/ las gcig tu nganges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtang bar bya'o/
264a2(mdo sde): dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
264a3(mdo sde): / rnga s+tha zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
264a4(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti
264a5(mdo sde): byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
264a6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi
264a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya byug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa
264b1(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'
264b2(mdo sde): mgur spyod do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ che bar
264b3(mdo sde): grags pa/ bya ka la bing ka ltar skad snyan pa/ rdo sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed
264b4(mdo sde): do/ / nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta bu'i gdang sa dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u rnga sgra pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun
264b5(mdo sde): ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / sar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khru
264b6(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang yo byad bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang /
264b7(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig
265a1(mdo sde): ko/ de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u rnga skra shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs/
265a2(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong
265a3(mdo sde): nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
265a4(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
265a5(mdo sde): chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden
265a6(mdo sde): pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams ni tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das
265a7(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / / de brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad
265b1(mdo sde): rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par kyang rong de/ cho song thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra
265b2(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bu
265b3(mdo sde): bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la

265b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rnga sgras las ci bgyis na/ des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur lags/

265b7(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pas na/ rnga sgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i
266a1(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing
266a2(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi za//
266a3(mdo sde): tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

266a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po smyug ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan
266a7(mdo sde): las 'das so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad

266b2(mdo sde): khyim bdag gcig gis rol mo'i cha smad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mi las rol mo bslabs te/ mchod rten de la phul nas/ de dag mchod rten de la nyin gcig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag

266b4(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis nad ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu

267b6(mdo sde): nyin gcig kyang dus gsum du lag pas brams te/ 'o mas yang dang yang du gtor cig dang / de'i 'og tu rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag thams cad chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par
