269b1(mdo sde): so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi klu gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/
269b2(mdo sde): 'bang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re zhig na mdza' sde bo brgya
269b3(mdo sde): phyi rol du byung ba dang / de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu til mar spos can gyis byugs nas/ me tog dang /
269b4(mdo sde): tog 'phreng dang / mar me dbul ka dag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas/ lhan cig tu smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der spun du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lho gcig kho na nas
269b5(mdo sde): 'byung bar gyur cig/ chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang / byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par
269b6(mdo sde): gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni chen po che 'di dag yin te/ de dag
269b7(mdo sde): gis lhan cig tu mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na/ 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/ tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni gcig tu 'thun par rab tu byung
270a1(mdo sde): nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro//
270a2(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas
270a3(mdo sde): nalas gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtang bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab
270a4(mdo sde): par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
270a5(mdo sde): bam po bcu drug pa/ nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi
270a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am u0f7f r
270a7(mdo sde): nams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
270b1(mdo sde): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdun
270b2(mdo sde): dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya kro d+ha'i kun dka' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'itshe
270b3(mdo sde): ser skya'o gnas na shAkya'i bu phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam tho skya bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig
270b4(mdo sde): gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags
270b5(mdo sde): nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhig btsas nas/ de las kho ra khor yug tu
270b6(mdo sde): nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste/ de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byas so// de nas pha ma dang / khyim de na gnas pa'i
270b7(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor rnams dang / nye du rnams dang / ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston
271a1(mdo sde): byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u de btsas ma thag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma
271a2(mdo sde): bzhin du gsal bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u nyi ma phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma
271a3(mdo sde): 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang
271a4(mdo sde): yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phar pa dang
271a5(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/
271a6(mdo sde): gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ngar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
271a7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu
271b1(mdo sde): kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos
271b2(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags
271b3(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u nyi mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
271b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshim par byas
271b5(mdo sde): nas/ ba ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/
271b6(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsa chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid
271b7(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
272a1(mdo sde): tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa
272a2(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan
272a3(mdo sde): pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing smod la/ lkog 'phyas byed de/ da 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs nas/ lam po che dang / srang
272a4(mdo sde): dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'khyam pa las ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o// bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa'o zhes 'dzer to// de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar
272a5(mdo sde): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ci nas bdag
272a6(mdo sde): gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na/ med par byar mi nus so// de lta mod kyi/ ci nas dang ba dang
272a7(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa
272b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
272b2(mdo sde): pa nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas// nyi ma nyid
272b3(mdo sde): kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su dag gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/
272b4(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
272b5(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' zhig la rnams par smin par 'gyur ro/ / lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//
272b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
272b7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten
273a1(mdo sde): du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'drin las tham
273a2(mdo sde): cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das
273a3(mdo sde): de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der
273a4(mdo sde): srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams
273a5(mdo sde): kyis spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshar dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do// de nas re zhig na mi zhig rgyal po
273a6(mdo sde): dang rgyan po rtses nas skugs su nor bu rin po che me shel zhig thob bo/ / de nas de dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags te/ zhabs la
273a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur
273b1(mdo sde): cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ nor bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang spyi bo la thogs bzhin du ma'i lto nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so//
273b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshe lo la dor sgyu byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi
273b3(mdo sde): mchod rten la bkur sti de byas pa dang / nor bu rin po che gtags pa des na/ de'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid
273b4(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ / dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
273b5(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren
273b6(mdo sde): ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
273b7(mdo sde): de dag yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gyad kyis ba dan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
274a1(mdo sde): dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
274a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
274a3(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang
274a4(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
274a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa
274a6(mdo sde): des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba rgyas
274a7(mdo sde): dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ gang gi tshe khye'u de btsas pa 'di'i tshe lnga
274b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis kho ra khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag bsgrengs so/ / lha'i rol mo'i cha byad dag kyang brdungs so// lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis kyang gtor
274b2(mdo sde): te/ ser skya'i garas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to// khyim thams cad du'ang de'i phyir ba ngan bsgreng ngo // de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad
274b3(mdo sde): gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig rten thams cad na grags pas rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags zhes gdags so zhes zer ro//
274b4(mdo sde): de nas khye'u snyan grags pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad
274b5(mdo sde): kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang po cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//
274b6(mdo sde): de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go/ de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u
274b7(mdo sde): snyan grags shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes
275a1(mdo sde): par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gi brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom
275a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ / dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
275a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to// de nas khye'u snyan grags
275a4(mdo sde): kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sprin te/
275a5(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang /
275a6(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang /
275a7(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsod chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
275b1(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa
275b2(mdo sde): rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
275b3(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de'ang gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba'i gos spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do// gsol
275b4(mdo sde): ba btab ste/ phul ba'i zas dang / mal che dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong sprod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/
275b5(mdo sde): the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgreng nas/ 'jig rten
275b6(mdo sde): du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag snyan grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu
275b7(mdo sde): tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de
276a1(mdo sde): dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
276a2(mdo sde): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams
276a3(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ / lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal ba brgyar yang chud mi bri// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//
276a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
276a5(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig
276a6(mdo sde): rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad
276a7(mdo sde): nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyer yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung
276b1(mdo sde): la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dngapag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der
276b2(mdo sde): srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten
276b3(mdo sde): gyi dus ston byed pa der gyang 'gyed pa rnams kyis ba dan dag bsgreng ngo / / de nas re zhig na rgyal po'i gyad gcig gis gyad gcig non pa dang / des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas/ des de blangs te srog
276b4(mdo sde): chags 'bum phrag du mas 'khor dang bcas pa rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
276b5(mdo sde): kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan de mchod rten gyi steng gi srog shing la btags nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis
276b6(mdo sde): mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gyang du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snyan grags 'di yin te/
276b7(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ 'khor bar bde ba mtha' yas pa myong bar 'gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid
277a1(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ / dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges
277a2(mdo sde): par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges
277a3(mdo sde): par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
277a4(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las
277a5(mdo sde): rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ste/ sdom gyi tshigs su brjod pa bdun pa rdzogs so// sdom ni/ 'od bzang ma dang rab sdug ma// dkar mo zla ba ut+pa la// mdzes
277a6(mdo sde): ldan ma dang mu tig dang / / ka tsang ga la bde byed ma// mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan// 'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po
277a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / mong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
277b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lham
277b2(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
277b3(mdo sde): dang / khrims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas
277b4(mdo sde): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i
277b5(mdo sde): nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga'
277b6(mdo sde): la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyun gyis klubs pa/ nor bu rin po
277b7(mdo sde): che mgul na thogs pa zhig btsas te/ de nas 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad sdang bar byas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji snying gdags zhes ming
278a1(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming
278a2(mdo sde): 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ / de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i me ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis
278a3(mdo sde): te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/
278a4(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// bu mo de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la slong ba su
278a5(mdo sde): dang su 'ongs kyang rung ba de dang de dag la mgul nas rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do/ / byin nas kyang yang rgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/
278a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pha lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsams pa/
278a7(mdo sde): gal te gcig la byin na ni/ gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas re zhig na bu mo ngas pa sems khongs su chung ba mthong nas smras pa/ yang
278b1(mdo sde): ci zhig gis sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas phyis bu mo de na re/ yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig dang / da ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim/
278b2(mdo sde): zab ga dam par 'tshal lo zhes zer ro// de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol nas/ mnyan du yod par dril bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang ma rang nyid kyi khyim thab
278b3(mdo sde): 'dam par chad kyis/ khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byas so// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhon te/ chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng
278b4(mdo sde): nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don cing srang du zhugs so// de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu
278b5(mdo sde): rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta ba de dag la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shad kyis byang bar bshad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni mi 'tshal na/ yod ye bdag
278b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho na pas so/ / bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/ de'i thang du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas/ de dag phyir log go// bu mo 'od bzang
278b7(mdo sde): ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
279a1(mdo sde): de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/
279a2(mdo sde): thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas mngon par shes
279a3(mdo sde): pa'ang ba sgrubs so/ / de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
279a4(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing /
279a5(mdo sde): dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di la gdul bar byas pa mang po
279a6(mdo sde): dag des 'dren par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig/ de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas
279a7(mdo sde): byung ste/ mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nas bsams pa/ 'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzung bar byas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis
279b1(mdo sde): bstabs pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis mur
279b2(mdo sde): du dad par byed de/ de nas de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag
279b3(mdo sde): 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ sru mar spyon/ mar spyon/ khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu dag mngon du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang
279b4(mdo sde): ma nam mkha' las babs nas/ skye bo phal po che'i gung la 'dug ste/ gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to// de nas bcom ldan
279b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de/ des de rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so// de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor
279b6(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/
279b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa 'ams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam
280a1(mdo sde): mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa// rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes
280a2(mdo sde): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /
280a3(mdo sde): gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'od bzang mas las gang dag
280a4(mdo sde): bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul pa nas kyang nor bu rin po che byung la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom
280a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon che rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za/
280a6(mdo sde): bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las
280a7(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba
280b1(mdo sde): dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa
280b2(mdo sde): brgyar yang chud mi za/ / tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la
280b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
280b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na
280b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
280b6(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu
280b7(mdo sde): dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so// de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo pad+ma rgas nas/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus las bkrol te/
281a1(mdo sde): mchod rten de la phul lo// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba
281a2(mdo sde): 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gnyen
281a3(mdo sde): yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs btags pa des na/ gzugs bzang
281a4(mdo sde): zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las
281a5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam pa smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar
281a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / las 'dren ma rnam ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig
281a7(mdo sde): tunges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom
281b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
281b2(mdo sde): dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang /
281b3(mdo sde): mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
281b4(mdo sde): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang /
281b5(mdo sde): snyun ga sos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// /
281b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/
281b7(mdo sde): yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du rab tu sdug ma zhig btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo
282a1(mdo sde): 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rang sdug ma zhes
282a2(mdo sde): gdags so zhes zer ro/ / de'ang tshe rabs dran te/ btsas ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yang rung // zhing gi khyad par gzhi las 'phel bar 'gyur// de'i phyir
282a3(mdo sde): mkhas pas bsgrims te 'jig rten du/ / dad pas lha mi'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin// de nas de'i pha ma dang / gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing
282a4(mdo sde): sngangs te/ mi dga' bar gyur la/ spyi bung zhes byed nas smras pa/ kye ma bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig go/ des smras pa/ yum bdag ni sha za mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyi/ bdag
282a5(mdo sde): ni bu mo lags te/ sbyin pa dag sbyin par 'tshal lo// de nas de'i mas khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin la bu mi des 'di skad mchi'o zhes bsnyad do// de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la
282a6(mdo sde): rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin rabs gdon du bcug go// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis lo bdun
282a7(mdo sde): lon pa de'i tshe/ ba ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang / 'phangs pa dang / snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong
282b1(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ / re zhig na de'i tshe mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas/ der srog chags 'dum phrag du ma bza' ba dang btung ba med pas shi'o// de nas der bcom
282b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song rab sdug ma la nga na re 'khor bzhi po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang
282b3(mdo sde): mal ma dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du 'ongs nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha
282b4(mdo sde): nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams la zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zing rnams phul cig bka' stsal to// de nas rab sdug mas
282b5(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras so// de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par chas so// de nas re
282b6(mdo sde): zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gtom de thos nas shin tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste smras pa/ rabo sdug ma gar 'gro/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
282b7(mdo sde): skul pa/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byed par bskos so// mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ phyed kyi de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gyis/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so// rab sdug
283a1(mdo sde): mas smras pa/ gal te yab bden pa mthong ba lags la/ sa'i 'og thog thag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na/ sbyar ba 'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis
283a2(mdo sde): 'on kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do/ / de bzhin du dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang / btsun mo 'phreng rgyud ma dang / rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang /
283a3(mdo sde): btsun mo 'khor gyi bla drang srong sbyin dang / gna' mi dang / ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so zhes byas so// de nas
283a4(mdo sde): nags lung du song nas der mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o/ / de ltar skabs phye nas kyang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pazla ba gsum gyi
283a5(mdo sde): bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabs su brtson pa dang /

283b1(mdo sde): nadang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i

283b7(mdo sde): lhung bzed bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so/ / de nas lhas lha'i bdud rtsis bkang ngo // de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin dge
284a1(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag pa

284b6(mdo sde): tshal nas bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag khyer te/ de nas re zhig na de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras chan gyi gzeb khyer te rje bo'i phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma des

289b1(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las
289b2(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
289b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
289b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams
289b5(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas//
289b6(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sang
289b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims ma dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
290a1(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du
290a2(mdo sde): yod pa na/ bram ze phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas so//
290a3(mdo sde): de'ang rig byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ ming gi rnam grangs dang / shes gsal dang bcas pa dang / yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang / lnga pa ste/ gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnams tshig re re nas brda
290a4(mdo sde): sprod nus pa zhig go/ de nas de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do// de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las rung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan
290a5(mdo sde): cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs
290a6(mdo sde): bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yon lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan po zhig btsas so/ / de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i mong ji skad gdags zhes ming
290a7(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bdag cag gi bu tsha phal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo zla ba pang na
290b1(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma
290b2(mdo sde): dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//
290b3(mdo sde): de nas bu mo zla ba mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / bya ba la gsal ba dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur to// de nas re
290b4(mdo sde): zhig na de'i pha bram ze'i khye'u rnams sngags slob pa na de thos pa tsam gyis lobs so/ / thos nas kyang bstan chos de dag lta 'og dang sbyor zhing 'chad nus so// de nas de'i grags pas mnyan
290b5(mdo sde): du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to/ / mu stegs can dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du de la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs par byed do// de nas gang gi tshe bcom
290b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ mnyan du yod par gshegs nas mkhas pa rnams dang / mkhas par grags pa
290b7(mdo sde): de dag las phal cher bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir der 'dong bar byed do/ / de nas de dag mi snang nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ kye ci'i phyir de bstan chos shes pa dag mi 'ong ba 'di la
291a1(mdo sde): rgyu ci zhig yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs te/ de dag thams cad de la gzhol bar gyur to// de nas
291a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma byung ba thos nas/ de spu thams cad zing zhes byas so// de nas bu mo zla bas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de
291a3(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan
291a4(mdo sde): panyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i/
291a5(mdo sde): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i
291a6(mdo sde): bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo zla bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
291a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i thad du rab tu byung ngo // de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor
291b1(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par gyur
291b2(mdo sde): chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyamapa
291b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bu bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so
291b4(mdo sde): so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra
291b5(mdo sde): baba'i gnas su gyur to/ / de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge slong dag khyed cag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pa gdon par gyis shig ces bka'
291b6(mdo sde): sprul pa dang / de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dpog tu
291b7(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dge slong ma la tshig re re nas chos kyi lung 'bog par mi mdzad de/
292a1(mdo sde): gal te khyed las lan cig smras pas 'dzin nus pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni ngas lung dbog go// de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur
292a2(mdo sde): 'dug go/ de nas dge slong ma zla ba stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// lan cig bka'
292a3(mdo sde): skul pas bdag gis bzung bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ de nas
292a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par lung dbog pa mdzad nas/ lan cig bka' stsal pa dge slong ma zla bas lobs so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa
292a5(mdo sde): nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mang du thos pa rnams dang / thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tshom tha ma
292a6(mdo sde): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong ma zla bas las gang dag bgyis shing bsags pa des na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug
292a7(mdo sde): la mdzes pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zla ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/
292b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar
292b2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin//
292b3(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can
292b4(mdo sde): dag gi las rnams ni/ / bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na//
292b5(mdo sde): bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khro thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
292b6(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sin drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na
292b7(mdo sde): rten cing bzhugs so/ / de nas re zhig na bram ze'i bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des de la lung mnos te bslabs nas/ kha ton du byas te phung po la mkhas
293a1(mdo sde): pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par
293a2(mdo sde): byas so/ / mthar thug pa'i ye shes ni bskyed ma nus so// de mkhan mo gang las rab tu byung ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//
293a3(mdo sde): nas dge slong ma de 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das
293a4(mdo sde): 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar
293a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bdag thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig/
293a6(mdo sde): ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin te/ des smon lam
293a7(mdo sde): btab pa des na/ thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// des der lung mnos te bslabs nas kha ton du byas pa des na/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de
293b1(mdo sde): ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges
293b2(mdo sde): par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spang

294a2(mdo sde): na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / yid 'od gnyis phrad pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston

294a4(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ lang ro dang nad med pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa zhig yod de/ de gang gi tshe ltang mo pa'i nang du 'ong ba de'i tshe/

294a6(mdo sde): pa ston pa drug kyang 'ong ngo / / de nas bu mo ut+pa las/ skye bo mang po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na mir gyur pa'i nang na bdag dang byung gzugs kyis mnyam pa 'am/ khyad par du
294a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa de lta bu 'ga' lha yod dam/ skye bo mang pos smras pa/ dge sbyong ko'u ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa yod do// ut+pa las smras pa/ cing mi yin nam/ 'od te lha yin/ skye bo mang pos
294b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ mi ni yin mod kyi/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no// de nas tshig de thos nas ut+pa la rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // song nas kyang
294b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gar byed cing glu len la rol mo byed do// bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi rtags rnams dang / bud med kyi brda rnams dang / bud med kyi
294b3(mdo sde): rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do/ / der dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gang yin pa de dag ni des ci bya gtol med par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dod chags
294b4(mdo sde): kyi shas che ba rnams gdul ba dang / ut+pa la'i byad gzugs dang lang chos rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gi sa ut+pa la rgas shing 'khogs la mgo skya ba

294b6(mdo sde): dang lang chos rgyags pa de med par gyur to/ / dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams kyang skyo bar gyur to// de nas ut+pa la rgyags pa med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
294b7(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ci nas rnag can gyi lus 'di las tshegs chung ngus yongs su grol bar 'gyur pa de lta bu'i

295a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas kha cig gis ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye

295a4(mdo sde): bu mngon sum du byas so/ / kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// ut+pa la'ang dad pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan
295a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas pol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
295a6(mdo sde): rlung rnyim pa dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par zad cod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
295a7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs
295b1(mdo sde): pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / dkur

295b6(mdo sde): na dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'jug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad mkhyen
295b7(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes dang shes pa thams cad la dbang thong zir ba'i cheb mo ut+pa la bang gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pas dreg pa las rgas pas skyo bar byas nas/ gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa
296a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bzhag pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod de/ 'das pa'i dus nang 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas
296a2(mdo sde): pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba
296a3(mdo sde): na yang / ngas bu mo ut+pa la rga bas skyo bar byas nas brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung
296a4(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA NA si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skya
296a5(mdo sde): bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shi'i
296a6(mdo sde): dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo dang
296a7(mdo sde): lhan cig tu rtse zhing dka' la dga' dgur spyod do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u
296b1(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mdog bzang po// gser gyi kha dog can/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes rtse ba/ sna mtho ba/
296b2(mdo sde): legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ci skad gdags zhes ming
296b3(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed do/ / nye du rnams na re/ 'di'i yab yul ka shi'i rgyal po yin la/ 'di'ang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming ka shi mdzes
296b4(mdo sde): ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ / de nas khye'u ka shi mdzes ldan pa nga na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i me ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma
296b5(mdo sde): gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mer gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yod byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed
296b6(mdo sde): bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to// de nas de rgyal po byed pa ni nyes pa du ma dang ldan zhing
296b7(mdo sde): gnod pa du ma'i rtsa ba yin par rig nas/ drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo // de'ang gangs kyi sul zhig na gnas te 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chus 'tsho zhing / ri dgas kyi g.yang
297a1(mdo sde): gzhi dang / shing shun gyon la me'i sbyin sreg byed do// byis re zhig na 'bras bu dang rtsa ba'i phyir ri'i sul zhig tu song ba dang / re zhig na der mi 'am ci'i bu mo zhig
297a2(mdo sde): gis drang srong gzhon nu de mthong nas/ chags par gyur to// gar byed cing klu len la rol mo byed do// bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi rtags rnams dang / bud med kyi
297a3(mdo sde): brda rnams dang / bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do// de nas re zhig na drang srong ka shi mdzes ldan gyi bu mo de la chos bshad de/ me zhe khyod rgas te/ khyod kyi nga ro dang po ni snyad cing
297a4(mdo sde): mnyen la/ mjug ni rar por gyur to zhes byas so// de nas chos de lta bu bstan te/ de thos nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo'i byed gzugs kyi rgyags pa de med par gyur to// de nas de dad pa skyes nas
297a5(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa/ gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag khyod kyi slob mar gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan
297a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no// mi 'am ci'i bu mo de ni ut+pa la 'di nyid yin no// de
297a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa ut+pa las las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur lags/ las gang dag
297b1(mdo sde): bgyis na/ des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ut+pa la nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang
297b2(mdo sde): ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ ut+pa la nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su
297b3(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par
297b4(mdo sde): smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can
297b5(mdo sde): ngag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
297b6(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
297b7(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan na rten
298a1(mdo sde): cing bzhugs so/ / de nas re zhig na lho phyogs nas zlos kar mngan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs so// der gang gi tshe rgyal po mdzes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa
298a2(mdo sde): mthong bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la bsgo ba/ nga'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar gyi gar thabs gyis shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis rgyal po'i bka' spyi/
298a3(mdo sde): bos mnos te/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes byas so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar sbyar te/ legs par spangs nas/ rgyal po'i blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mdun du zlos gar
298a4(mdo sde): gyi gar thabs byas so/ / de nas der zlos gar mkhan gyi gar gyi slob dpon nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi che lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so// zlos gar mkhan gzhan rnams ni dge slong gi cha lugs kyis
298a5(mdo sde): nang du 'ongs so/ / de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la sogs pa zlos gar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la nor gyi phung po chen po byin no// de
298a6(mdo sde): nas de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin nas/ yang dag pa'i smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang /
298a7(mdo sde): sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong
298b1(mdo sde): dag ji snyam du sems/ zlos gar mkhan gang yin pa de dag ni ut+pa la sogs pa 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag gis der smon lam btab pa des na/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
298b2(mdo sde): byas so/ / dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam
298b3(mdo sde): par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa
298b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
298b5(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bcu bdun pa//
298b6(mdo sde): / mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang
298b7(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang /
299a1(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
299a2(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
299a3(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba'i ri dag kyi nags na bzhugs so//
299a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe grong khyer wA rA tA si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa
299a5(mdo sde): dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ga dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan
299a6(mdo sde): par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur
299a7(mdo sde): spyod do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes
299b1(mdo sde): pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ / de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams
299b2(mdo sde): na re/ bu mo 'di ka shi'i rgyal po'i bu mo yin la/ byad gzugs kyang bzang bas de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming ka shi mdzes ldan ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan
299b3(mdo sde): ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyisa'o
299b4(mdo sde): ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur
299b5(mdo sde): to/ / de nas gang gi tshe bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug gis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste/ khyod kyi bu mo btsas zhes bdag gis thos kyis
299b6(mdo sde): gzhan la ma sbyin par bdag gi bu la byin cig ces spring ngo / / de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin mya ngan gyi khung bur zhugs nas/ lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la
299b7(mdo sde): byin na ni gzhan rnams ni bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas re zhig na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te pha'i thad du song
300a1(mdo sde): des pa mya ngan gyis non pa mthong nas dris pa/ yab ci'i skad du mya ngan mdzad/ de nas pas kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa bskyed do// de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes
300a2(mdo sde): ldan mas pa la smras pa/ yab nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams da ste zhag bdun na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan na rang nyid kyi khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis/ khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces
300a3(mdo sde): pho nya gtang du gsol zhes byas so/ / de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug po rnams 'dus so// bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma'ang shing rnga la zhon te/ chos gos tshon can
300a4(mdo sde): gyi ba dan bsgrengs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs lag na thogs te/ rgyal po 'dus pa'i nang du song nas smras pa/ kye nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams gson cig/
300a5(mdo sde): bdag ni khyed kyi gzugs dang / lang tshe dang / rigs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug la mi sems kyi/ bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bdag ni ras
300a6(mdo sde): 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs bris pa gang yin pa de'i slob ma lags te/ de'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas/ drang srong smra bar song ste/ bcom
300a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen
300b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo
300b2(mdo sde): chen mo la gtad do/ / de nas des kyang de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid
300b3(mdo sde): g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs
300b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam
300b5(mdo sde): mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so/
300b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta dang / dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas
300b7(mdo sde): su gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis de'i gzugs dang / lang tshe dang / mdzes pa rjes su dran nas/ 'dod chags kyi rgyags pas myong te/ rab tu byung bzhin du yang gsol ba 'debs so//
301a1(mdo sde): de nas de dag gis gsol ba btang nas/ ngang ba'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnam
301a2(mdo sde): ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed do/ / de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba mthong nas spu zing zhes byed de/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/
301a3(mdo sde): bzod pa gsol te/ sru khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu dag mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid kyis/ bzod par mdzod cig ces byas so// de nas bu mo ka shaM mdzes ldan ma
301a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' las babs te/ skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug nas chos de lta bu dag bstan te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob bo// de nas dge slong dag the tsom bskyes te/
301a5(mdo sde): the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ka shi mdzes ldan mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung

301b6(mdo sde): dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa des gtsug lag lang zhig rtsig tu bcug ste/ yo byad thams cad kyis gang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
301b7(mdo sde): ba la phul lo/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la'ang rab tu byung nas lo khri'i bar du byams pa bsgoms so// dge slong dag ji snyams du sems/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu mor
302a1(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ka shi'i mdzes ldan ma 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang phul ba des ni gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
302a2(mdo sde): 'od srungs kyi ring la rab tu byung nas/ lo khri'i bar du byams pa bsgoms pa des ni/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnam
302a3(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam
