332b5(mdo sde): par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ / de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sde snod gsum pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des chos
332b6(mdo sde): gos tshon can 'tshal le/ dge slong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran bzhin du btsas te/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
332b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshegs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pa
333a1(mdo sde): na sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyis
333a2(mdo sde): sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i
333a3(mdo sde): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa rgyar yang chud miza// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/
333a4(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lonyi khri thub pa na// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
333a5(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhangs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba
333a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sin drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re zhig na rgyal po kri kri'i bu drang srong spra ngar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan
333a7(mdo sde): 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyid stong ngas lhag pa'i 'od
333b1(mdo sde): mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so// dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir
333b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba
333b3(mdo sde): de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du blta bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po la gsol te/ yab bdag bcom ldan 'das
333b4(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ring po mi thogs par rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur dgos pas/ 'di ni ngas bcos
333b5(mdo sde): su med do/ / bus smras pa/ rgyal srid nyes pa mang po dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dgrar gyur pa bdag la mi 'tshal gyis/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu mi 'byung du mi gnang ngo //
333b6(mdo sde): de nas yang kyis ma gnang nas des zhag gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum nas/ zhag drug gi bar du kha 'chos so// de nas de'i zla grogs rnams kyis/ rgyal po la gsol to// lha
333b7(mdo sde): mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ sras 'di rab tu byung na legs kyi/ de'u re 'angar 'gum nam legs so// de nas rgyal pos gnang nas dam 'char bcug ste/ nam khyod sde snod gsum ma longs kyi
334a1(mdo sde): / bar dung dang 'phrad du ma 'ong zhig ces bsgo'o// de nas re zhig na de yab kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang /
334a2(mdo sde): 'bad pas ring po ma lon par sde snod gsum longs te/ rig pa dang grol bar smra ba chos ston par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sngon dam bcas pa gnyer dgu mgor ma chag
334a3(mdo sde): snyam nas/ / de yab kyi thad du song ste phrad nas dris pa/ bu cung zad lobs pa lta yod dam/ des smras pa/ sde snod gsum lebs lags so// de nas des yab la chos de lta bu bstan te/ de thos
334a4(mdo sde): nas rgyal po mgu bar gyur to/ / de nas dga' ba skyes te smras pa/ bu gcig khyod la ci dgos// des smras pa/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sngan drangs la yo byad drug
334a5(mdo sde): 'bul lo/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ rgyal po'i pho brang ni rgya ches ci dga' bgyis shig/ de nas sde snod gsum pas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring 'khor nyi khri dang bcas te/ zhal zas bzang pos
334a6(mdo sde): tshim par byas nas/ dge slong re re la'ang yo byad drug drug phul lo// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag da ltar dka' bas rab tu byung ba thob nas// de bzhin shegs
334a7(mdo sde): panyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa
334b1(mdo sde): de dang der gos su chos gos tshen can gyon la/ dge sbyong gi cha lugs 'di dang ldan te/ tshe rabs dran par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji
334b2(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kri kri'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snga snod gsum pa 'di yin te/ rgyu de nyid kyis phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes
334b3(mdo sde): pa dang / tshe rabs dran par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par
334b4(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges

334b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams
335a1(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin nams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / minga'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas
335a2(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto'i bye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
335a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan
335a4(mdo sde): du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su
335a5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas// de de dang lhan cig tu rtsa zhing dga' la
335a6(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod do/ / de'i tshe mu ge mi bzad pas gnod pa byung ste/ slong bas kyang mi zas mi rnyed do// ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang char mi 'bab par bstan pa las/ re zhig na ded dpon de'i chung ma
335a7(mdo sde): la du chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ gang gi rin par khye'u de bcwa
335b1(mdo sde): pa de kho na'i nyin par nas than pa med par gyur to/ / de nas de'i grags pa mnyan du yod pa mtha' dag tu rgyas par gyur to// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming
335b2(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di'i grags pa kun tu rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming grags bshes gdags so zhes brer ro// de nas khye'u grags pa shes pang na 'tshe ba'i ma ma gnyis dang //
335b3(mdo sde): nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi sti
335b4(mdo sde): khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyang bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe khye'u grags bshes cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ rgyal bu rgyal byed
335b5(mdo sde): kyi tshal du don zhig la song ngo / / de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/
335b6(mdo sde): 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mngar ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so// dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das
335b7(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos
336a1(mdo sde): nas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/ pa ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des
336a2(mdo sde): brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig ldu da'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor
336a3(mdo sde): ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
336a4(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan ngan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo ba'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig
336a5(mdo sde): pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed
336a6(mdo sde): pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de'i mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa byung ste/ des na de la skom pa'i gnod pa med de/ gang gi tshe tsha ba'i dus su dge slong skom pa rnams
336a7(mdo sde): gung skyems la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du ba de'i tshe'ang de mi 'ong ngo / / de nas de dang bshes pa'i dge song rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phrir khyod la sgom pa'i gnod med ces byas so// des smras pa/ bdag
336b1(mdo sde): gi mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ des na bdag ni skom pa'i gnod pa med do// de nas dge slong dag the tso rgyas te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
336b2(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ btsun pa grags bshes 'dis las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mche ba gnyis las chab yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung la/ rab tu byung nas
336b3(mdo sde): kyang dgra bcom pa 'di mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag grags bshes 'di kyis sngor tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshegs rnyed cing rgyan grub pa dang ldan te/
336b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ grags bshes nyid kyis las byas sher bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur
336b5(mdo sde): te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/
336b6(mdo sde): las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa
336b7(mdo sde): brgyar yang chud mi za/ / tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo
337a1(mdo sde): nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/
337a2(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig
337a3(mdo sde): dge slong rgan po zhig la rab tu byung ba las/ de'ang le lo can zhig ste/ gzhan la de bsnyen bkur byed mi 'dod do// de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gnas brtan de nyid kyi bsnyen bkur byed
337a4(mdo sde): par bskos pa dang / de bdag ni bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no snyam du rgya cher 'dzin to// dge slong ches rgan pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur len par byed pa nas/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zad de
337a5(mdo sde): phyis re zhig na nad kyis btab pa dang / gnas brtan gyis sman pa'i lung bzhin du sman mar blud nas/ de mtshan mo skom ste ci bya gtol med nas chu dadung snum ste/ bdag gi chu snod kyi drung
337a6(mdo sde): du song na chu med par mthong ngo / / de bzhin du mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dge 'dun gyi drung tshang du song na de dag kyang chu med par mthong ngo // de nas re zhig na chu klung
337a7(mdo sde): zlog byed kyi 'gram du song na de yang chu med par gyur te/ de mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba skyed pa dang / dad pas byin pa lci bar
337b1(mdo sde): bstan pa'i phyir chu klung zlog byed kyi pha rol na shing zhig yod pa la 'dzegs te/ ras shig der btags nas/ rang gi las rnams bsams te/ las la rton cing 'dug go// de nas re
337b2(mdo sde): zhig na phyi de nyin par nam nangs pa dang / gtam de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bsnyad do// de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis skabs de thos nas
337b3(mdo sde): mi dga' bar gyur te/ phan tshun du bsnyad do// de nas de'i mkhan pos chu byin na de'ang ma mthong ngo // de nas de mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs la gsol
337b4(mdo sde): to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis gaN+DI rdungs shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas khang skyong gis gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams
337b5(mdo sde): 'dus so/ / grong khyer wA rA NA si thog thag tu ying gtam de grags te/ sems can 'bum phrag du ma 'dus so// de nas re zhig na de'i mkhan pos gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug tu
337b6(mdo sde): bcug nas/ ril ba spyi blugs chus bkang ste byin nas/ bu chu 'di dge 'dun la brims shig ces byas so// de nas 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba des skyo bar gyur pa de nyid
337b7(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la dad pa bskyed nas bsam pa drag pos chu de dge 'dun la brims so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la phan gdags pa'i phyir
338a1(mdo sde): phyag glang po che'i snga lta bu brkyang nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byon par byed pa'i phyag gis chu de bzhes te/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang blangs na/ 'on
338a2(mdo sde): kyang zad par ma gyur to/ / dge 'dun thams cad la brims na'ang zad par ma gyur to// de nas lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul ya mtshan can de mthong nas/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma
338a3(mdo sde): bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ / de'i rgyud la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sor chud par gyur to// gang gi tshe nad sos pa de'i tshe// des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chus mi brel bar
338a4(mdo sde): byas te/ lo khri nyis stong gi bar du des dge 'dun la chu drims so// de nas phyis re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang /
338a5(mdo sde): sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
338a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed/
338a7(mdo sde): par ma gyur cig/ bdag gi mche ba'i phrag nas kyang chu yin lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du
338b1(mdo sde): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni grags bshes 'di yin te/ des lo khri nyis stong gi bar du dge 'dun la chu brims te smon lam btab pa des na/ tshe 'di la mche ba'i
338b2(mdo sde): phrag nas chu 'byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag
338b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge
338b4(mdo sde): slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
338b5(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
338b6(mdo sde): rdzus te skyes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi ri rnams dang / tshong
338b7(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang /
339a1(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / glu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang
339a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
339a3(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'dus
339a4(mdo sde): brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na/ rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam pa zhes te/ sku bskrun pa'i yum dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la'ang chos
339a5(mdo sde): ston to/ / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dka' rab na dbyar gnas par dam bcas so//
339a6(mdo sde): denas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
339a7(mdo sde): 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod
339b1(mdo sde): yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ / chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cad
339b2(mdo sde): mi zer bar 'dug go/ / de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de
339b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis da ltar bcom ldan 'das gang du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa cung zad gsan tam// tshe
339b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ kye bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu
339b5(mdo sde): dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam pazhes te/ sku bskrun pa'i yum dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la'ang chos ston cing bzhugs so zhes thos so// de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams
339b6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi du chen pos smras pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams dbyar zla ba gsum
339b7(mdo sde): 'das nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba dar song ste lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshe dang
340a1(mdo sde): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs stod/ yang dag par
340a2(mdo sde): dga' bar byed do/ / chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go//
340a3(mdo sde): de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
340a4(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ma mthong nas ring mo zhig lags te/
340a5(mdo sde): bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bas skom lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ gal te btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la gnod pa ma mchis na/ btsun pa mo'u
340a6(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ zhabs la phyag bzhes te gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tshe 'am/ stobs dang
340a7(mdo sde): ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad ces kyang gsungs shig/ btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'khor ba zhi pa
340b1(mdo sde): rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ 'di skad du btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la ni gang gis 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen
340b2(mdo sde): bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan
340b3(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis na/ thugs brtsa ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum
340b4(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o zhes mol du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de
340b5(mdo sde): nas 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las ladra
340b6(mdo sde): te dong ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ dper na mi stobs po che lag pa bskum
340b7(mdo sde): pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa brdol
341a1(mdo sde): gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam du dkar po lta ngur 'dug pa der son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ni lha'i 'khor
341a2(mdo sde): brgya phrag du mi'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston te/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo // mthong nas
341a3(mdo sde): kyang 'dzum dmul te/ bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis gang ba bzhin du 'di na ni 'khor mang po dang bzhugs so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
341a4(mdo sde): ldan pa moru 'gal gyi bu chen po'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di dag la ni rang dbang med de/ gang
341a5(mdo sde): gi tshe ngas deng zhig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe ngas shog cig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sems kyis nga'i bsams pa shes nas 'ong ba dang
341a6(mdo sde): 'dod par 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
341a7(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i 'khor thams cad la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa kye ma lha'i 'khor sa
341b1(mdo sde): tshogs 'dus shing 'khod lags so/ / lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang mchis so// chos dang / dge 'dun
341b2(mdo sde): dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
341b3(mdo sde): pos smras pa la 'thun par dgongs te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la ba di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de na de bzhin te/ de ni de bzhin no// kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs
341b4(mdo sde): 'dus shing 'khod do/ / lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do// chos dang / dge 'dun
341b5(mdo sde): dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang yod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
341b6(mdo sde): dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mthun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de ni de
341b7(mdo sde): bzhin no/ / de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do// lha'i 'khor minang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu
342a1(mdo sde): bya/ / dag kyang yod do// chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang
342a2(mdo sde): yod do/ / de nas lnga'i bu gnan zhig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gar gyi bu chen po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/
342a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do//
342a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag yod do// chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes
342a5(mdo sde): nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do// de nas lha kha cig stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
342a6(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te// lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa lags so// lha
342a7(mdo sde): gzhan dag cig gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun par bdag cag ni chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas
342b1(mdo sde): 'dir skyes pa lags so/ / de nas der lha brgya phrag du ma dang / lha stong phrag du ma dang / lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar so so'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brda sprod pa byas
342b2(mdo sde): nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sa lha rnams dong bar rig nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su
342b3(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams com ldan 'das kyi zhangs la phya 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung
342b4(mdo sde): ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tshe 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang mchis lags so// bcom
342b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod dang 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po 'khod pa rnams bde bar gyur cig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na
342b6(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te 'di skad ces kyang mchi'o// btsun pa 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams la ni gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ba
342b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ma mchis la// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang
343a1(mdo sde): gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis
343a2(mdo sde): na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gar gyi bu
343a3(mdo sde): 'o na khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du song la 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ kye bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam du'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a bad dza ra'i nags
343a4(mdo sde): su shing u dum wa ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes sgron cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bos phyag 'tshal
343a5(mdo sde): nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ dper na mi stobs po che lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang pa las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
343a6(mdo sde): yul nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du son par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas 'khor
343a7(mdo sde): bzhi po rnams la sbran pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a bad dza ra'i nags su shing a dam pa
343b1(mdo sde): ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes byas so/ / de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dang / a bad dza ra'i nags
343b2(mdo sde): su shing u dum wa ra'i drung du gshegs so/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das grong khyer snang ldan der gshegs pa de'i tshe/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dus so/
343b3(mdo sde): de nas der dge slong rdzus te skyes pa zhig byung ste/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am cingang / lto
343b4(mdo sde): 'phye chen po de dag bshos la spyan drangs nas/ re zhig na gdugs tshod la bab pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i gdan dar yug khyim chen pos g.yogs pa dag dang / lha'i zhal zas bza' ba dang
343b5(mdo sde): bca' ba dag byung bar gyur to/ / de nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pa des bcom ldan 'das lha'i zhal zas kyis tshim par byas te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /

343b7(mdo sde): bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di 'di g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor
344a1(mdo sde): ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyan mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum
344a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pa
344a3(mdo sde): sgoslonga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi b+ha da/ dbang po
344a4(mdo sde): dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes de/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom

344b1(mdo sde): dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las
344b2(mdo sde): dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal par rgyar

345a1(mdo sde): pa/ 'di ltar 'di rnams kyis bdag las brten te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su

345b2(mdo sde): de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas des smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa 'das na/ bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang

345b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin te/ smon lam btab pa des ni rdzus te skyes par gyur to// des der dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa
345b5(mdo sde): des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ / dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro//
345b6(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de

346b2(mdo sde): blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas nas/ de btsas pa'i tshe shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis grong khyer ser skya'i

346b7(mdo sde): dga' ra bar song ngo / / de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od
347a1(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la

349a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dbul po shing thun du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin te/ des mchod rten dang / mchod rten gyi 'khor
349a2(mdo sde): sa phyags pa des na gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to/ / rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag
349a3(mdo sde): de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges
349a4(mdo sde): par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs
349a5(mdo sde): la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
349a6(mdo sde): de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bam po nyi shu pa// ka po na zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
349a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / chu rnams

349b2(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
349b3(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
349b4(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe lho phyogs na rgyal po rtogs ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/

349b7(mdo sde): so/ / de nas phyis re zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ btsun mo la bu chags nas// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa
350a1(mdo sde): las dbyung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa// yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ 1
350a2(mdo sde): bi na zhes ming btags so/ / de nas khye'u ka pi na pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad

350b7(mdo sde): po chen po bzhin de'i sgo dpon lta bur bkod do/ / glang po ches srungs kyi bu lta bu dag dang / ta sprin gyi shugs can lta bu dag dang / shing rta dga' byed sgra lta bu dag dang / mi gnod sbyin mi bzad pa lta bu dag kyang bkod de// bcom ldan

355b4(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
355b5(mdo sde): tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu gnyis lon te/ lo bcu gnyis
355b6(mdo sde): 'das nas/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su byon pa de'i tshe bre bo zas dang / bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya stong phrag du mas bden pa mthong ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni ma gtogs so//
355b7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sras kyi legs pa de dag mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ de'i blo skyes pa/ gal te bdag gi bu rab tu ma byung du zin na ni 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i
356a1(mdo sde): rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni 'di thor tsugs can rab tu byung ba'i g.yog byas pa ni rab tu mi mdzes kyis/ bdag
356a2(mdo sde): gis shAkya rnams las khyim re mi re rab tu 'byung du gzhug go gor ma chag snyam mo/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir grong khyer du dril bsgrags so// de nas shAkya
356a3(mdo sde): thams cad 'dus pa'i nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gos smras pa/ kye shAkya khyed rnams nyon cig/ gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung du zin na yang khyed kho nas 'di la bsnyen bkur
356a4(mdo sde): bya dgos na/ da 'dir rab tu byung gis/ shAkya khyim re mi re bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rab tu phyung zhig ces byas so// de nas bzang ldan dang / ma 'gags pa dang / nam grub dang / lha sbyin la sogs pa
356a5(mdo sde): shAkya'i bu lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar chas so/ / de nas de dag gi 'dreg mkhan bsnyen bkur byed pa nye bar 'khor des de dag rab tu 'byung ba mthong nas dus so// de nas shAkya rnams kyis nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i
356a6(mdo sde): phyir ngu zhes dris so/ / de nas des snying rje rje skad zer ning / sdug sdug skad zer la/ gti zhing sna te/ khyed rab tu byung na de bdag la zas dang gos kyis skyong ba su zhig mchis// de nas shAkya rnams kyis smras pa// nye bar
356a7(mdo sde): 'khor 'o na ras thing zhig byas so/ / de nas ras bting nas shAkya rnams kyis lus la thogs pa'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai tsuR+Ya dang / dpung rgyan dang / sor gdub
356b1(mdo sde): rnams phung por spungs te byin no/ / de 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gyis rab tu 'byung ba de dag kyang mthong la/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs la'ang bltas nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa skyes te/ shAkya 'di dag ni tshe/
356b2(mdo sde): rigs dang / byad gzugs dang / lang tsho dang / 'byor pa dang ldan pa yin na/ 'on kyang btsun mo rnams dang rgyan 'di dag mchil ma bzhin du bor nas/ rab tu byung na bdag ci'ang mi bdog pa zhig gis nga
356b3(mdo sde): rgyan 'di dag khyim du bskur du ci yod de/ 'di dag btang la bdag kyang 'di dag gi rjes su rab tu 'byung gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste
356b4(mdo sde): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag lta bu'ang legs par gsungs pa'i chos
356b5(mdo sde): 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba mchis la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal
356b6(mdo sde): lo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu phyung ngo // de nas bzang ldan la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya dge slong gi cha lugs can rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
356b7(mdo sde): dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal bar byas pa las/ / de dag gis nye bar 'khor ngo shes nas tshe rigs dang / byad gzugs dang / 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i phyir nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal du ma btub nas/ der
357a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la bka' stsal pa/ bzang ldan gang gi phyir nga'i bstan pa 'di la ni tshe rigs dang / byad gzugs dang / lang tshe dang / dang
357a2(mdo sde): phyug dang / rigs bzhi rnam par dag pa dang sbyar ba med kyis/ 'di la phyag tshol cig/ de nas bzang ldan la sogs pa dag kya lnga brgyas chos nyid btsan par byas nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa
357a3(mdo sde): bzhin du rkang pa la phyag byas so/ / de dag gis rkang pa la phyag byas nas mod la sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas der tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'ad
357a4(mdo sde): pas pho la mig rdza pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyol ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
357a5(mdo sde): yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam
357a6(mdo sde): pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang
357a7(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i
357b1(mdo sde): gnas su gyur to/ / de'ang bdag nyid che ba dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba zhig ste/ phyi zhig na snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par
357b2(mdo sde): spyod yul la chas so/ / de nas re zhig na rigs ngan zhig gi khyim du bsod snyoms la song ngo // de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal glang po che'i gtso bo pad+ma dkar po gcig pu zhes bya ba la zhon te
357b3(mdo sde): kha lo pa rgyu ba'i bu ring po dang / bcom ldan 'das la blta bar phyir chas pa las ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bzang ldan dbang po zhi ba/ yid nye bar zhi ba/ sems chog tu dul zhing
357b4(mdo sde): bar zhi ba dang ldan la/ phyag dar khrod kyi gos gyon zhing kha zas ngan pa khyer te rigs ngan gyi khyim de nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang kha lo pa rgyu ba'i bu ring po la dris pa/ 'di dge slong bzang ldan ma
357b5(mdo sde): yin nam/ kha lo pas smras pa/ lha bka' stsal pa bzhin te de lags so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khams nas brgyal te sa la ltung ngo // de nas chus gtor ba dang / phyir sangs te sems
357b6(mdo sde): brtas nas kha lo pa rgyu ba'i bu ring pos bslang ngo / / de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/

358a1(mdo sde): snyoms blangs te/ rigs ngan gyi khyim nas slar byung ba de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni shin du dul bar bgyid pa lags te/ de la bsten na 'di
358a2(mdo sde): lta bur skyid de bar mchis la/ bde bas bskyed pa dag kyang 'di ltar tshul dul bar gyur pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bzang ldan 'ad
358a3(mdo sde): la ni ngo mtshar che ba gzhan yang yod kyis nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po bzang ldan 'di ni dgon pa na gnas sam/ shing drung na gnas sam/ khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste/ kye ma re skyid kye ma re skyid/
358a4(mdo sde): bdag rab tu ma byung ba tsam na rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang na 'dug ste/ blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis shin tu legs par bsrungs la ra ba dang / 'obs dang / sgo dang /
358a5(mdo sde): gcan gzan rnams kyis bskyabs kyang snying gzhan la dogs shing mi dga' la kun la'ang khu 'phrig za bzhin te/ gnyid kyang mi 'ong ba las/ da ni bdag lus dang srog la'ang mi lta bas gnas gang dang
358a6(mdo sde): gang du'ang bde bar 'du yod do zhes dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du rjod par byed do/ / de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ des the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
358a7(mdo sde): zhus pa/ btsun pa bzang ldan gyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las gang dag bgyis shing bsags na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rgyal po'i rigs phyug por skyes la/
358b1(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bzang ldan nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan

358b3(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par sman par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par
358b4(mdo sde): smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa ni zon pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi la

358b6(mdo sde): sprang po zhig gnas pa lus bkres shing nyam chung bas non nas/ phan tshun du 'khor 'khor ba las bu mo 'khur ba khyer ba zhig mthong ngo // de nas sprang po des 'khur ba 'dod pa'i phyir bu mo de bsnyags te/ nan

359a1(mdo sde): tshen/ rang sangs rgyas sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/
359a2(mdo sde): re zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig sprang po de'i mdun du 'ongs so// de nas sprang po des rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi ba de mthong nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de dga' ba chen pos rang gi sdug bsngal dang
359a3(mdo sde): bsngos te rang sangs rgyas la 'khur ba de phul lo/ / de nas rang sangs rgyas des de'i dga' ba rgya chen po bskyed pa'i phyir/ ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags

359a6(mdo sde): skyes pa de dang der rigs mthon por skye ba dang / 'di lta bus chos thob par gyur cig/ 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur
359a7(mdo sde): cig ces byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sprang por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bzang ldan 'di yin te/ des rang sangs rgyas la 'khung
359b1(mdo sde): ba phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni shAkya'i rigs phyug por skyes so/ / gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des der lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa

361a3(mdo sde): 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig/ khyod ni skyid de bar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/ khyod ni sdug ma myong ba yin te/ tshangs par spyod pa ni

361a6(mdo sde): ging dul 'khor sbyong ca mazir ro/ / de nas khyim bdag gi su yul 'khor spyong gi ma gnyis kyis nyin rnams la bskul te/ kye nye du rnams bu yul 'khor skyong srob zhig ces byas so// de nas khyim bdas kyi
361a7(mdo sde): yul la khor skyong gi du rnams khyim bdag gi su yul 'khor srong gal ba der song ste lhags nas/ khyim bdag gi gratshul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// buyul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig/
361b1(mdo sde): khyod ni spyod de bar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin 'os sreg ma myo nga yin latshangs pa spyod pa ni snang par dka' 'o// dben par gnas pa ni dka' 'o// gcig pur 'dug pa ni

361b7(mdo sde): dgon pa dang / nags khung dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas bca' bar ni yid la bsam par yang dkas/ nges pa yul 'khor skyong khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyad
362a1(mdo sde): #par gyis shig/ sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig/ bsod nams dag kyang kyis shig ces de skad byas na'ang / khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi zer ro// de nas khyim bdag
362a2(mdo sde): gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// yab
362a3(mdo sde): yum gnyis mkhyen par mdzod cig/ nges pa yul 'khor skyong gum na ci rung gis yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung du stsol cig dang / gal te rab tu byung ba la dga'
362a4(mdo sde): bar gyur na ni gson por mchis na khyod kyis gzigs par 'gyur grang / gal te dga' bar ma gyur na ni/ bu 'gro ba'i sa pha ma ma gtogs pa gzhan ma mchis so// pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/ byis pa dag gal te bu
362a5(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong rab tu byung ba'i 'og tu nged dang 'phrad du 'ong na ni de bzhin du gnang ngo / / de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der song ste lhags
362a6(mdo sde): nas/ yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smraso// des pa yul 'khor skyong khyod rab tu 'byung bar ni pha ma gnyis kyis gnang mod kyi/ gal te rab tu 'byung ba'i 'og tu 'phrad du 'ong ba na gdong gnang ngo
362a7(mdo sde): zhes zer ro/ / yul 'khor skyong gis spras pa/ kye phrad par bgyi'o// de nas khyim bdag gi'u yul 'khor skyong khad kyis lus kyi mthu dang stobs bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste
362b1(mdo sde): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
362b2(mdo sde): gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag ni pha mas gnang lags na/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na
362b3(mdo sde): bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
362b4(mdo sde): bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to// de de ltar rab tu byung nas/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor bar 'khor lo
362b5(mdo sde): 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad stsol ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jog pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/
362b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/
362b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang lag thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
363a1(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang //
363a2(mdo sde): gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong dgon pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge
363a3(mdo sde): slong yul 'khor skyong 'di yin no/ / de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa yul 'khor skyong gis las gang dag bgyis na//
363a4(mdo sde): des phyug po'o rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
363a5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis sngon tshe rangs gzhan dag tu tshegs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las
363a6(mdo sde): de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su mig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags
363a7(mdo sde): pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge babyas
363b1(mdo sde): shing bsags pa de rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chung
363b2(mdo sde): mi za/ / tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// lus 'phags kyi rgyal po pho dang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas
363b3(mdo sde): pa pha rol gyi dmag tshegs byung ste/ ci bye gtol med nas/ nags khung du zhugs te/ de nyi mi'i gung la nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha bas gdungs nas dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te phan tshun 'khor 'khor nas lam
363b4(mdo sde): yang ma rnyed do/ / sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe na/ rang sangs rgyas sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tshe ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams
363b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ re zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig dgon pa'i lam de na gnas pa des snying rje bskyed nas/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de la lam yang bstan/ chu'i lteng ka'ang bstan na/
363b6(mdo sde): des rgyal po de 'khor dang bcas pa'i srog 'phangs pa bskyangs so// de nas rgyal po de dad pa skyes nas/ rang gi grong khyer du khrid de zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so//
363b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rang de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas smon lam 'ata' pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/
364a1(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par mgyur
364a2(mdo sde): cig ces byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di yin no// dge slong dag yul
364a3(mdo sde): 'khor skyong gis ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
364a4(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
364a5(mdo sde): 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong sdu ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe grong khyer wA rA NA si na/ rgyal po kri kri rgyal po byed de/
364a6(mdo sde): de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun
364a7(mdo sde): dang mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po
364b1(mdo sde): byed do/ / de nas de'i bu tha chung drang srong smra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes
364b2(mdo sde): par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lnga bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la sems dga'
364b3(mdo sde): babar gyur to/ / dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis de la
364b4(mdo sde): chos bstan te/ de dad pa skyes pas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs 'khor dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas te skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// yong su mya ngan las 'das
364b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'og tu 'ang mchod rten la gdugs bu chung btags so/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di 'di yin no// yul
364b6(mdo sde): 'khor skyong gis ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA NA saM na bram ze las su rtsa ba rko ba zhig gnas pa de re zhig la rtsa ba rkor song ste/
364b7(mdo sde): nags khrod du 'khor 'khor ba las/ des der rang sangs rgyas nang pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas de dang pa skyes te de la bsnyen bkur byas nas gang gi tshe nad sos pa ro'i tshe'ang bshos gsol to/
365a1(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes
365a2(mdo sde): par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rtsa ba rko ba'i bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong
365a3(mdo sde): 'di yin te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor ban nams kyang sdug bsngal myong bar ma gyur la/ da ltar yang rgyal po'i rigs phyug por skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug la mdzes par gyur to// rgyu de'o
365a4(mdo sde): nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ / dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar
365a5(mdo sde): ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de lnga ra na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /
365a6(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa
365a7(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa rdzogs so// /
365b1(mdo sde): sdom ni/ rab 'byor dang ni rgan po dang // lag pa can dang lde gus gsos// 'khor ba dang ni sbed pa dang // mi sdug pa dang gang+gA pa// sen rings dang ni yang dag sdud// sde tshan dag/
365b2(mdo sde): tu bstan pa yin// rab 'byor zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi
365b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci
365b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
365b5(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
365b6(mdo sde): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na
365b7(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ / de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ljongs so sor 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la
366a1(mdo sde): phan gdags pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams bskos pa de'i tshe/ bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de dag ni ri rab kyi bang rim la bsam gtan ltar byed cing 'khod do// de nas re zhig na
366a2(mdo sde): byabyi'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas klu'i phrug gu zhig blangs te/ des ri rab kyi 'ang rim gyi steng du phyung nas bza' bar brtsams so// de nas klu'i phrug gu de 'chi ba'i tshe nyan thos chen
366a3(mdo sde): po rnams la sems dga' bar byas te shi'o/ / de nas de shi nas mnyan du yod par bram ze 'byor po zhes bya ba de'i chung ma chen mo'i ltor zhugs nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u
366a4(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/ / de nas btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad ga dag zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di'i ba 'byor po yin
366a5(mdo sde): pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rab 'byor ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ / de nas khye'u rab 'byor bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas/ de sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs dang shugs gyis spro thung ba dang / khro ba dang
366a6(mdo sde): zhe gnag pa'i shas che bar gyur to/ / de nas pha ma gnyis kyis srid srung las phyung ste/ drang srong gi nang du rab tu zhugs nas/ de'ang de na bsam gtan lhur byed par gyur te/ nags khrod gcig na rtan
366a7(mdo sde): cing 'dug go/ nags khrod de na lha bden pa mthong ba zhig kyang gnas te/ des de la snying rje bskyed nas/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni khro ba dang zhe gnag pa'i shas che bas khyad par thob par mi 'gyur gyis/ bdag
366b1(mdo sde): gis 'di bcom ldan 'das la ltar gzhug go snyam mo/ / de nas lha des rab 'byor gyi mdun du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod de// de nas rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das
366b2(mdo sde): lta ba'i 'dod pa bskyed nas lha de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du khrid do/ / de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
366b3(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong
366b4(mdo sde): ma thag tu de sems can rnams la zhe non pa'i sems gang yin pa de med par gyur to/ / de nas dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
366b5(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to//
366b6(mdo sde): de thos nas rigs kyi bu rab 'byor gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse me thon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas de bcom ldan 'das
366b7(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas byams pa bsgoms pas sems btul nas/ phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par
367a1(mdo sde): rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad ched de/ nyen mongs pa thams cad
367a2(mdo sde): spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra
367a3(mdo sde): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa
367a4(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
367a5(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis skyes pa bsams pa dang / des tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du klu las shi 'phos te klu' bar zhig tu skyes par mthong
367a6(mdo sde): ngo / / de nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bdag gis 'di ltar zhe sdang gi rkyen bsgrubs pa des na bdag tshe rabs lnga brgyar klu 'ba' zhig tu skyes te/ de kho ma'i phyir sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur gyis/
367a7(mdo sde): cinas bdag la gzhan dag gis zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur zhing / de dang ldan pas lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur
367b1(mdo sde): mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i lam yang dag par blangs te gnas so// de gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ grong ngam/ yul lam/ ljongs su bsod snyoms kyi phyi
367b2(mdo sde): gnas par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ thog ma kho nar spyod yul la lta bar 'dod de/ bdag mthong na tha na grog sbur yan chad su'ang sna 'ga' zhig gi phyir sems sdang bar mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ des spyod lam
367b3(mdo sde): de btang ste gzhan du bsgyur nas/ des sems can de dag gi sems dga' bar gyur te/ de dgra bcom pa nyid yin du zin kyang de lta bu'i nyam dang myong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis blo skyes pa/
367b4(mdo sde): mal bdag gis nga ni skye bo mang po la phan gdags so snyam mo// de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' lding lnga brgya sprul te/ de dag mjed nas klu rnams skrag cing sngangs te mi dga' nas phan tshun du ci bya
367b5(mdo sde): gtel med par gyur to/ / de nas rab 'byor gyis yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yongs su bskyabs so// de nas de dag sems dga' bar gyur nas/ byams pa'i lung phog go// de nas
367b6(mdo sde): yang klu chen po'i gzugs su sprul nas nam mkha' lding lnga brgya gtses te/ de dag kyang skrag nas byams pa'i lung phog nas// des de ltar klu dang nam mkha' lding gi rigs lnga brgya lnga brgyad tul lo// de nas der
367b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu rab 'byor 'di yin no//
368a1(mdo sde): nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor u0f7fsa pas gang dag byas na/ des/
368a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rab 'byor 'di kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rjed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan
368a3(mdo sde): te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rab 'byor nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis 'ams su myong bar 'gyur te/
368a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las
368a5(mdo sde): dge ba dang mi dge 'a byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/
368a6(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pan// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'ang
368a7(mdo sde): nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo to khro thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
368b1(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyor ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mo rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA sin drang srong smra
368b2(mdo sde): pa'i ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ / de nas der 'di rang byung ste/ 'dis sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin nas/ lo khro'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs te smon lam btang
368b3(mdo sde): pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i

368b6(mdo sde): ba dang / las kyi lam rnams mthar thug par ma byas pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed nas sprul gdug pa zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod de/ des na klur skyes so//
